The monster Killer / monster shooter has now been brought to bounty hunting situation in a freezing jungle where monster shooting for monster killing is required to save the jungle from the monsters.What is this SuperHero Game all about:This bounty hunting game depicts monster shooting and monster killing by an army soldier. This game has different monster hunting objectives. Each level in this spider game has an interesting elimination objective for the monster killer. There are 2 modes for the monster killer each mode having different levels for monster shooter in this monster game. More modes may be added to this spider game in future. Your mission in this spider game as a monster shooter is to do monster shooting and monster killing to save the jungle from the monsters.How to play this Monster Killer Game of Monster Hunting?You will be provided with different skills for monster hunting to keep yourself safe from the monsters. Use the following skills as forest hunter:1. Set your direction in the line with the target monster.2. Aim well and try to hit accurately to finish the monster in one hit.3. Touch the attack button to eliminate the target monster.4. As this forest hunter game has different levels so complete the objective set for a certain level to successfully unlock next level of this hunting game.5. Once you have cleared a level in this forest hunter game, you can always come back and give it another shot to better your previous mission accomplishment time in this monster game.Why play this forest hunter by Kool Games?You are surely going to love this hunting game over the others due to following salient features:1. Totally Free: This monster game is totally free!2. Delightful graphics: This hunt game has awesome graphics. The graphics are high quality as well as very smooth so you are going to have your best gaming experience in this great game.3. Entertaining music: This hunting game has a very entertaining music!.4. Very realistic sound effects: The sound effects in this monster game are very realistic and they keep you fully engaged in this killer game.5. Top Quality Fun: Its great fun to play this spider game as the aim is to save the jungle from the monsters.6. Realistic Missions: The mission associated with each level of this killer game is very realistic and it throws you in the real world while keeping you fully involved. Each mission in this spider game is time bound with a specific elimination target of monsters to keep you focused on the job at hand.7. Player Feedback: Kool Games is always looking forward to your feedback on this US hunter game and try our best to make your gaming experience more and more interesting.Who should play this monster game?Anybody who wants a challenge to keep himself safe from the monsters should play this game and establish the basic skills in the simulating environment mapping to the real world. Everyone else looking for endless hunt of monsters is also welcome to play this killer game.When to play this US hunter game?This game can be played at any time during the day or during the night. You are at office or at home, wherever you are free for monster hunting, just pull out your mobile and enjoy playing this killer game.Kindly do not forget to provide the rating for this hunt game as per your hunting game experience and you can also suggest improvements in your feedback/ review comments of this game.Enjoy the FOREST HUNTER game.

descriptionHTML:
Take part in one of the BattleMinibots armoured car shows – spectacular robots fighting games of armoured car and robot warriors radio-guided vehicles. These indestructible battle cars are extremely dangerous, each with its unique weapon for death racing. Create your own armoured car minibot in the garage and upgrade its properties to make it to the try-out and become a member of the mech robot wars League!

Enjoy watching steel robot fighting BattleBots and armoured car Robot Wars shows? Always dreamed of creating your own indestructible battle cars robot and building a team to take part in the death racing show? With Robot Fighting 2 - Minibots robots fighting games ANYONE can be part of robot warriors and armoured car wars game – this car battle is thrilling, and it's free!

Drive to the steel robot fighting arena and be ready for the most breathtaking car wars game with death racing! These robots vs robots car battles are something really amazing!

Face the most powerful death racing super mechs. You're going to deal with them in mech robot wars:
Excabot
Drillbot
Smile minibomb
Sawbot
Nailthrower, and other machines for car battle!

Complete super mechs tasks and earn great rewards. Get improving weapons (flame-thrower, magnets, taser, saws etc), armour to protect minibot’s body. Find the best equipment for the minibot and create your own destruction machine. There are new minibots for your collection!

Fight with your super mechs on multiple battle arena locations with additional obstacles – traps, spike strips, kill saws, hell raisers, ramrods, etc. Interact with objects on the battle arena (crates, fire extinguishers) and learn how to use the traps in your favour. Earn experience points in robots fighting games and get access to minibot customization – new armour, weapons and styles for more breathtaking car wars game.

And remember: the more achievements you unlock, the better, as only the most persistent players will join the mech robot wars League. Let the car wars game start!
Activate your VIP-status, to unlock more game abilities.

Robot warriors war: be #1 in our worldwide leaderboard!

Robot Fighting 2 - Minibots is:

15+ robot warrior and super mechs with unique fighting mechanics, for extreme machines games
Personalization with the help of armour and weapons
Mighty iron warriors and thrilling robots vs robots PvP battle arena fights.

Breathtaking robots vs robots fights are waiting for you. Choose machines for a steel robot fighting and go to the battle arena!

on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/robotfighting2/

We look forward to your comments and suggestions for improving the game.

description: Superhero you and your craft - survival. This amazing world is full of dangers, you will have very little time to make decisions, you need a lot of ingenuity and good reaction to achieve at least some results.Jump, dodge, fly around obstacles in its path, if you bump into an obstacle, the story is over.The game offers 5 modes :Flight - fly around the poles. Caution! Some columns can move.Running - live in the rhythm of parkour, run, jumping over barriers. You can do a double jump.Jumping - you need to get as high as possible, you will have to pursue the monster, which will annihilate the floor beneath you. If you are not fast enough, it will fall.Spider - fly on the web through the tunnel, you will find many obstacles in the way and they are not very simple. (This is the most difficult in the game mode)Bonus mode.Game Features:- Procedurally generated blocks world and buildings.- Cool graphics: enjoy the best pixel cube graphics with high fps.- Free game: play the game for free!- Choose your super heroe. - You can unlock four mine characters.- Incredibly easy operation.Go to adventure!
descriptionHTML:
Superhero you and your craft - survival. This amazing world is full of dangers, you will have very little time to make decisions, you need a lot of ingenuity and good reaction to achieve at least some results.
Jump, dodge, fly around obstacles in its path, if you bump into an obstacle, the story is over.


The game offers 5 modes :
Flight - fly around the poles. Caution! Some columns can move.
Running - live in the rhythm of parkour, run, jumping over barriers. You can do a double jump.
Jumping - you need to get as high as possible, you will have to pursue the monster, which will annihilate the floor beneath you. If you are not fast enough, it will fall.
Spider - fly on the web through the tunnel, you will find many obstacles in the way and they are not very simple. (This is the most difficult in the game mode)
Bonus mode.

Game Features:
- Procedurally generated blocks world and buildings.
- Cool graphics: enjoy the best pixel cube graphics with high fps.
- Free game: play the game for free!
- Choose your super heroe.
- You can unlock four mine characters.
- Incredibly easy operation.


Go to adventure!
summary: The main goal - to move forward no matter what. Survive at all costs.
title: Quad Squad

description: Are you crazy fans of fire and water or fire and ice (teamwork game) ?Fall in love adventure maze game and remember it from childhood ?Fire Red boy and his lover (ice girl - Water girl) who go with him is a puzzle adventure game for two players. It's an very addicting game to play with your kids, your lover and your friend.You've got two characters to control in this exciting puzzle game. Lead Red boy and Water girl to their doors in each level of the Crystal Temp Maze, collecting fire diamonds and ice diamonds along the way. Red boy must avoid the water and Ice girl must avoid the fire, and be careful, the black water kills them both. Using your brain to control objects in game such as lever, pusher, mirror, black ball, light beam, elevator, wind machine, pulley systemin order to open path that leads to the doors.GREAT GAME FEATURES:- 30 Maps and continue update - Nice character fire boy is red boy- Nice character blue girl is water girl- Always support .All levels are updating frequently- Nice Soundtrack- Classic gameplay from web- Back to childhood

comments: This is an amazing game, but it has pros and some cons. PROS: This game has too many pros to list (two of the pros are that it's very realistic, and there's a sandbox). CONS: Engine noise that is different for each vehicle would be nice, but at least not every vehicle has the same sound. Sometimes certain "crews" (AKA Skins) don't apply to certain vehicles. It says you fell of the world when you fall off of the world.

Great game and the best part is it's free!! The only thing I can see that could use some improvement are the controls... and it wouldn't hurt to be able to change the point of view... other than that I say "jolly good show" as I tip my hat to the creators!

Way too many ads. Not just ads, it's that annoying video-kind of ad you have to watch X seconds before you can skip. After every single level. Even in the tutorial, where you need about 30 secs - 1 minute per level.

The ads never stop! videos you can't skip, two ads in between every level, you can't even exit the app with two more ads popping up and having to wait for them to close. Developer should've taken less money to make the gameplay better.

Fun for 3 minutes, then i saw the same ad ten times in a row. OMG. I get it, you have to make money, but this is ridiculous. The forced ads are unbearable. If i wanted to install Terminator wars, Clash of Clans or Bubble Witch Saga, i would have done it already.

Loved the start and finish. Got away from me a little with the desert levels... and the random water levels at the end of the city map. Would've loved more loading and unloading of trucks and as well as the construction arc you sometimes saw with buildings going up.

comments: Its a good game, i like this kind of games and i love when i play with friends too! The game its really easy to play, a strategy game and simply as destroy the enemy base... Love it! Its true that not all are going to like this but for me this game its 5 stars. Btw i have started the game and i said i love to play with friends, does this game has a Couple/Duo match to play with them (Not versus them). Thanks in advice, keep staying great!!

The game is okay it has a lot of faults. The matching system is horrible it always puts me against people that are hundreds of levels higher than me. And somehow their money regenerate quicker and they're able to send  out more and bigger and better units out on the battlefield. Even when the matchmaking system puts me against somebody my own level their money regenerates quicker than mine and they send out a lot more units faster than I can for whatever reason. Uninstalling this game

I absolutely love this game! As a person who enjoys strategy games, from RTS such as Stronghold, Supreme Commander, and C&C, this game takes my top 3 for the phone. The match making system is very good at keeping same skilled players together, as well as it isn't very much a pay to win game. The units are decently balanced and the game isn't to slow or fast. Definitely a game I will keep playing for a long time. I do want to ask, if you guys will be putting in a "survival mode", and withstand against waves of enemies. Great job FourThirtyThree

I'll update whenever I can actually play the game. It's up to date. I get to the screen that asks if I'd like to use my Google account or Facebook account. I do not have a Facebook. Obviously I have a Google account. I'm writing this review. I click Google and both options disappear. It sets at that screen where the two options were previously available and nothing happens. I made sure to wait around 5 mins to see if it was a loading issue.. dunno. I'd love to try out the game.

really good game i love it but just some ideas that might make it even better (I think the menu on the left side could have a higher contrast (text and background)or I think the trophy chest amount could be adjusted to the player amount in the clan +to participate in trophy chest you have to be in the clan since it started (midnight)please do some balance changes soon... some untis don't feel to be used enough or some just are OP like the steel saw mech or another idea :to have some way to delete (locked) chests )please reply if you (4:33)see it and want to give a statement

This game is awesome, it reminds me of Guns Up! . The ONLY thing I don't like about it is it's basically pay to win. I only have 5 slots to open chests and it cost gems to open the chest and money to get gems. Other than that, the gameplay is solid. It's very unique in it's actually a wonderfully crafted game and not some thrown together garbage. I probably will end up throwing money at it only because it's made so we'll. But like I said I do feel the process for opening chests is a bit too cash hungry...

descriptionHTML:
How exciting! Kiki is going shopping with Mama Panda! It means the freedom to explore, only if he can stay out of trouble! See the problems he will run into! Perhaps, you can give him a big hand!

Fun features:
- Easy concepts with child-friendly gameplay
- 4 independent scenes with fun interactions
- Silly and entertaining animations!

With freedom comes responsibility. Our goal is to bring safety awarenesses to children. They will relate safety tips to the situations they see and catch all the poor behaviors acted out by our silly panda Kiki. Maybe they will pay more attention to safety the next time they go out, too!

-- -- --

Design concepts:
We focus on inspirational learning
We focus on skill-building
We focus on bringing fun contents to our young audience
Take the baby bus for an unique learning experience!

The series introduction:
BabyBus is the first trusted brand in early childhood educational software. The mobile applications are designed and developed specifically for preschoolers, and they are divided into two groups by age, the Starter Group for toddlers between the ages of 1 and 3 and the Prodigy Group for children between the ages of 3 and 6.

The educational series in the Prodigy Group combines the main concepts of early childhood education to meet the needs of mastering different learning categories. The applications are aimed at the comprehensive and the analytic development in preschoolers.

description: If you love makeup, beauty secrets and Ice Princess, then this game was made for you!  Play to enter a magical make-up salon and apply beauty products on the beautiful princess of winter!In this game for girls you’ll have complete freedom to design an endless collection of different looks and styles, with unforgettable makeups and fairy-like hairdos. Ice Princess will challenge your imagination with tons of crystal-like eye-shadows, blush colors and amazing lipsticks, plus, absolutely fabulous and wintry face-paints to give the makeup a final touch of awesomeness.And when it comes to the hairstyles chapter, be sure you’ll have tons to choose from! Ice-Princess loves changing the color and looks each day, so all you need to do is choose!Browse through tens of colorful hairstyles, braids and ponytails, then choose your favorite hairlock color to glam the fancy hairdo up.For a final touch, choose from the wonderful tiaras collection the one that will make your queen of all the lands of ice shine the most! Match it up with a divine top, and there you have if: the story is complete and your princess is ready to charm the world once more with diamonds sparkles and winter-glam all around. • Play to discover all these wintertime features: • Skin-tones and blushes • Eye-lenses and eyebrows • Fabulous mascaras • Tons of glamorous eyeshadows• Sparkly and matte lipstick colors• Wintry face-paints• Icy tops• Necklaces and earrings• Beautiful hairstyles  • Wonderful tiaras So if you’re looking for a casual game that combines the magic of the most wintry winter, with beauty, icy jewels, and fabulous makeup, here it is!
descriptionHTML:
If you love makeup, beauty secrets and Ice Princess, then this game was made for you!
Play to enter a magical make-up salon and apply beauty products on the beautiful princess of winter!

In this game for girls you’ll have complete freedom to design an endless collection of different looks and styles, with unforgettable makeups and fairy-like hairdos. Ice Princess will challenge your imagination with tons of crystal-like eye-shadows, blush colors and amazing lipsticks, plus, absolutely fabulous and wintry face-paints to give the makeup a final touch of awesomeness.

And when it comes to the hairstyles chapter, be sure you’ll have tons to choose from! Ice-Princess loves changing the color and looks each day, so all you need to do is choose!
Browse through tens of colorful hairstyles, braids and ponytails, then choose your favorite hairlock color to glam the fancy hairdo up.

For a final touch, choose from the wonderful tiaras collection the one that will make your queen of all the lands of ice shine the most! Match it up with a divine top, and there you have if: the story is complete and your princess is ready to charm the world once more with diamonds sparkles and winter-glam all around.

• Play to discover all these wintertime features:
• Skin-tones and blushes
• Eye-lenses and eyebrows
• Fabulous mascaras
• Tons of glamorous eyeshadows
• Sparkly and matte lipstick colors
• Wintry face-paints
• Icy tops
• Necklaces and earrings
• Beautiful hairstyles
• Wonderful tiaras

So if you’re looking for a casual game that combines the magic of the most wintry winter, with beauty, icy jewels, and fabulous makeup, here it is!
summary: If you love makeup and Ice Princess, then this game was made for you!
title: Ice Princess Makeup

description: Meet the continuation of the game series Survival in the Ocean!You are person who survived after airplane crash in deep ocean. No one around could help you. On the horizon is not visible land. Around only the ocean and hungry sharks.But fortunately, the boxes that were left behind after the plane crash are passing by! You have a hook with you! You can collect these boxes - they can have many useful resources and items. You should watch over your health and at the time of eating. At the top of the screen are indicators of health, satiety and oxygen levels. Take food to replenish your health. You can go fishing and then cook your food at the stake. So you can live longer.Dive into the water - there are many interesting things! Beware of dangerous hungry sharks. Craft a powerful tool in the workbench to protect yourself from sharks. Collect seaweed on the ocean floor, look for hiding places. From algae you can make a very nutritious soup!Make your raft as big as you can! Collect different resources. Use them to craft new items. Use the workbench and oven to open new recipes for craft.Ocean Survival 3D - 2 features:- Ultimate ocean survival simulator- Life on raft- Dangerous underwater world- Easy learning craft system- Optimized graphics- Realistic visual effectsDive into deep ocean, explore underwater world! It's time to survive with Ocean Survival 3D - 2!
descriptionHTML:
Meet the continuation of the game series Survival in the Ocean!
You are person who survived after airplane crash in deep ocean. No one around could help you. On the horizon is not visible land. Around only the ocean and hungry sharks.

But fortunately, the boxes that were left behind after the plane crash are passing by! You have a hook with you! You can collect these boxes - they can have many useful resources and items.

You should watch over your health and at the time of eating. At the top of the screen are indicators of health, satiety and oxygen levels. Take food to replenish your health. You can go fishing and then cook your food at the stake. So you can live longer.

Dive into the water - there are many interesting things! Beware of dangerous hungry sharks. Craft a powerful tool in the workbench to protect yourself from sharks. Collect seaweed on the ocean floor, look for hiding places. From algae you can make a very nutritious soup!

Make your raft as big as you can! Collect different resources. Use them to craft new items. Use the workbench and oven to open new recipes for craft.

Ocean Survival 3D - 2 features:
- Ultimate ocean survival simulator
- Life on raft
- Dangerous underwater world
- Easy learning craft system
- Optimized graphics
- Realistic visual effects

Dive into deep ocean, explore underwater world! It's time to survive with Ocean Survival 3D - 2!
recentChanges: - fixed climb on raft from water
- improved graphics - choose Graphics Quality in the Settings
- new visual effects - realistic water and weather
- you can escape - try to find a way out
summary: You on raft. Survive on raft in ocean. Build, craft, use hook, dive and explore!
title: Ocean Survival 3D - 2

comments: This game was my favorite of any maybe ever. I played all the time, then there was an update and I had to uninstall. It made the app close constantly (even when it wasn't even open and I was in other apps), there's way too many ads that make me want to vomit, and it stats to lag now when it never did before. Someone at corporate ruined this game. Smh.

Smooth control. Awesome idea . Not Much more I can say about it.(First Review). Now, my first thoughts about this game was that it was very good but as I have updated the game it has just been very slow and overturns when you tap. It also randomly takes you to the play store without tapping on an ad.

The game itself is pretty fun. I think I'd like it. But the ads are far, far too intrusive. Not only are there too many. But, many of them have timers. Some are 30 seconds, and you can't break out. Too annoying. I have no interest I sitting and waiting for ads to finish

Very enjoyable game, quite addictive and jumping back into a new game is quick. Couple of gripes, there seems to be some slow down or framrate dipping after an ad has shown and the option to remove ads isn't working. Sort this out and it will get another 2 stars

The game was awesome and I loved it. But the latest update ruined it with ADS. They put the banner exactly where you mostly tap with the fingers to change direction, the game got laggy which it was not before and has started getting way too many pop ups. Uninstalling. *Sigh*

A lot of frame rate issues. Lost many runs because controls become unresponsive while gameplay continued. Ads are incredible intrusive. That said, it can be really fun if they cleaned up the coding on this simple game.

comments: enjoy this game, welldone!!   Suggestion: can bring 2 or 3 weapons and swap in battle.    Hint for newbie, tripple bow is the key.   Dont waste money on entry level of each weapon, always save for the strongest. 1st start with tripple spear. The poison blowgun is good for earning money in training but very for later game level 80+  Get 25k is pretty easy to earn in daily rewards and training. I can get it in a few hours quickly, each training 4-10k point.

- if you are playing the game there is no option to get out of the app or to go to the main menu or restart the play.  - bug: even if the player is dead the game does not terminates this Happens for 5 times in 100 that is not a good show. - I loved played the app but I think you should test the app for the bugs and some missing functional points  - over all I will rate app 4 star & good

This is an excellent little arcade game with simple but challenging controls. I like the variety of different weapons you get to choose from and the graphics are lovely and evoke a kind of 'dawn of time' feel. The only criticism would be that earning ivory (the in game currency) is slow and there are no other options to obtain apart from buying some.

One of the best challenging game I've played so far. In the beginning it seems a very tough game (specially the terror bird story) but eventually you'll fall in track. One thing I would like to suggest that in gameplay, if there is an option to change the weapon (maybe in between 2 alternatives), then it would be more interesting. Thanks.

Its great and addicting and has very little ads. The only thing I don't like is that the amount of levels needed to move on in the game and the prices if weapons are a bit too much. I would give it like a 4.8/5

The art work, the atmosphere, the weapon choices. It's perfect. I couldn't be more happier that i found this game. The only thing I would personally change is the Tribe Leader's cheering sound. It's a bit silly and is the only thing that truly breaks the immersion of this game for me.

descriptionHTML:
◆ Popular game that achieved 10 million downloads worldwide!

​An intense hunting game of starving tribal people!
Hunt the primeval gigantic animals!

Long time ago, a bushman tribe lived in an outback town.
People were starving to death because of continuous droughts
The leader of the tribe goes out for hunting every day for living.....

Big Hunter is a dynamic physics game that hunts gigantic primeval animals with spear, axe and boomerang. Become the world's best hunter with a variety of weapons!

Big Hunter Features:
- Easy control with addictive touch of hitting
- Hunting game based on dynamic physics
- Simple but outstanding graphic design
- Rhythmical game sounds
- Challenge to the 100 levels with the near impossible!
- Show off your Hunt skills to all your friends via SMS, Facebook, Twitter, and more!

Big Hunter supports high resolution for an optimal gaming experience on both phones and tablets.

Are you already a fan? If so then visit our website, like us on Facebook for the latest news:
https://www.facebook.com/bighuntergame

Last but not least, a big THANK YOU goes out to everyone who has played Big Hunter!

description: Dinosaur World Craft Exploration:Lite - an exciting game in prehistoric cubic universe where you build, construct, create & craft - using blocks - in world! Dinosaurs (t-rex [tyrannosaurus], triceratops etc.] all around you! This lite pocket mine blocky craft game, inspired by the popular cube & voxel based pocket edition creative games, lets you craft dino world! No dragons and no survival - just prehistoric reptiles! Teenage boys and girls are welcome! Craft & build a perfect cube dinosaurs world! Exploration of world is here! Construct anything you want! Play in a creative mode with unlimited resources or mine deep into the cube dino world.Craft, and explore! Exploration of randomly generated cube prehistoric worlds, islands. Build and create amazing & perfect things from the simplest of homes to the grandest constructions! Start the adventure with “Dino Jurassic Craft Exploration”! This game will bring you only joy and relax! No dragons and survival world craft mode. Just cube jurassic craft world/island and your infinite creativity! Very quick and easy. All for free! This pocket edition (exploration) game contains: block placing, cube world, real time world craft generation. Build a dinosaur world!Craft & Explore the cube world! In this incredible and totally free game you can destroy all the blocks, collect resources, survive and build beautiful & perfect Buildings. This  pocket edition game (PE) contains a large number of different blocks with which you can craft your own cube world/Island! High resolution textures, very convenient and thoughtful game control, High FPS, without compromise! So plunge into the fantastic world of ‘Dino Jurassic Craft: Exploration & Evolution’ - with new cube worlds and adventures! Place blocks / cubes move voxels, dig and mine! Go beyond your wildest dreams, make your own cube jurassic world, mine, castle or city! Great game for adults! And teens! Transform the surface in a 3D environment in Jurassic Jungle! Build shelter, fight, grow and use blocky craft. The only limit is your imagination! Start a cube world craft! comments: The graphics are nice, but the controls are very hard. Especially in a boat. I finally built a boat, but I couldn't go anywhere because the boat only went in one direction wherever I tried to steer. The pets are very helpful, but there are way too many ads. I placed a campfire down but later it disappeared. I can't move an object I placed, and I accidentally placed a campfire in front of my doorway and I couldn't destroy it nor move it. Changing the direction of furniture would be handy too because I couldn't fit the bed in my tiny house because I couldn't switch the direction it was facing. I also couldn't make more than one thing at a time. If I were to cook food in my oven, I had to wait because I couldn't make something in my workshop while something was cooking.

I see a lot of reviews saying this game is boring. Well, kind of right and kind of wrong. It is tedious getting started but once you figure out what you want to do, this game is like most surviver games. You get resources, build stuff and kill animals. So if you are looking for an action packed kill em all experience, this game is not for you.

I really like this game, it's fun and addictive! One thing happened that I'm not to impressed with though. I got a pet elephant, but it disappeared and now has made everything harder once more. Could you please give me my pet elephant back.

Call me shallow but I've dissed the game because there is no english flag. I know you might say 'well i can't put every flag in' but english must be one of the top 5 countries, especially for language.  For that i haven't given a good reveiw.

I see a lot of other reviews dissing the adds for a *FREE* game (umm... Use cash for pixels and buy an ad free game then... Making games isn't easy and/or cheap and sponsorship {ads} is how it is funded... stop feeling entitled) My complaint is the lack of directives after initial survival is achieved and well I'm not a guy and would rather have a choice in gender. Fun but much underdeveloped. Love to see this built upon

descriptionHTML:
You don’t remember how you got to this island, but now you’re stranded in the wild. Surviving here will be no simple task. First you’ll need to find food, craft some primitive tools, and build a shelter. Think you have what it takes? Your survival adventure is about to begin…

Game features:
*Explore the wilderness!
*Build your house from the ground up!
*Utilize an extensive crafting system with tons of recipes!
*Meet the island fauna!
*Island survival sandbox simulator.

Survivalist tips:
★Begin with chopping wood in the forest. Wood is used for craft.
★Craft armor and weapons for fighting wild animals.
★Don’t starve, survivor: collect all available resources to keep yourself fed.
★Craft everything you might need.
★Keep track of your health, or you won’t survive…

If you like other survival games, play Survival Island: Evolve – it’ll be just what you’re looking for. Begin your survival adventure now!

*IMPORTANT. Online multiplayer is still in development and will be available soon. Follow our news feed to be the first to know when you can play with friends!

We’re on social networks:
FB: https://www.facebook.com/Survival-Island-Primal-570956786397542/

comments: The game was pretty good... The only problem though is that the gamer does not always work. The only time I have noted that they don't work too well is when I am trying to build a wall, or wall with a window. It won't let me put it down when the space is clear and on the edge of the raft, I have tried everything!!! Is it the game or my device?

The game is fun or would be if the game automatically saved so if you does you wouldn't have to start completely over. And maybe if it wasn't so hard to survive and probably more fun as well. Survival simulator is much easier and a lot more fun. Also  unlike survival simulator where I can build it doesn't let me build anything even though it says you're supposed to be able to but it didn't allow me to.

Overall very well made. I love it. Its just like the PC version. 👌 2 things however that could make it even better: 1) Sometimes the view would glitch/turn to one side and i didn't even tell the character to look that way. If the devs can fix that and make the turning smoother, that would be great! And 2) Sometimes i can't switch from one item to another. That can be very bad when i am trying to get to my spear to protect my raft or switch to drink my cup of water. Fix those things, and this game will be golden! 👍👌

This game sucks. Hydration doesn't last at all. And before you can learn to build raft parts, the shark eats your raft.   Mainly, the buttons glitched out and didn't respond for when I wanted to switch to my grapple, or my tin can to collect water. So... im uninstalling.
Game has a lot of potential, but needs work. Hard to move and use things. Plus lots of glitches where you can't do anything or get taken to main screen in mid game.

Didn't like it one bit. :( First of all, the game laggs and gliches too much. Second, it takes a long time to load into the game. Third, the game laggs so much, that when the shark come it DEVOURES me. I would be kind and give this a 2 star rating.
description: Do you like to play survival games ? Imagine that you are only one person is survived after catastrophic crash in ocean! You found yourself all alone on the small raft wandering in the ocean. There are no signs of earth nearby. You see all kinds of debris passing by that made you realize that you are the only survivor of ship crash! Now you need to fight and struggle for your life if you want to survive! The angry and hungry shark is always near your raft, waiting for you to fall down so you gotta be careful! Gather resources from the water to craft equipment and instruments, find food and drinkable water to stay alive and expand your raft to create more comfortable place to live in!Try to catch barrels, leaves, wood and other staff standing lonely on a raft! Beautiful ocean, wind, waves what else is needed? Yes anything. So throw your hook and try to catch staff!== Survival On Raft features:- Completely new survival experience!- A real raft in the middle of the ocean!- Crafting, building and surviving!- Very cool looking graphics!If you are a huge fan of other survival game ( survival in the sea ), play Raft - Try to Survive simulator – it’ll be just what you’re looking for. Completely new experience when you are on the edge of life and death! Begin your survival adventure now!

description: If you’re into makeover games, this one will knock your socks off. And if you’re not into makeover games, this one will change that! description: Grand Stunt Jump San Andreas - an action game with a unique gameplay. The protagonist is a gangster who was in a state of free fall in a mine filled with various obstacles. Your task is to manage to bypass obstacles in order to prolong the already short life of a real gangster.But do not think that we threw this dangerous guy into the thick of events without the right to survive. At your disposal will be bonuses that will increase the chances of survival, such as winding time, jerk and others. But whatever you do, this gangsta will still die, the only question is how many meters will he live, falling in an infinitely low mine. Use all your strengths, do not let the bandit break into a cake in the first 10 meters.Compete with your friends, whose gangster will fly the longest distance! It all depends on your reaction and your skills.Features of Grand Stunt Jump San Andreas- 3D game from the third person in the style of San Andreas- Real gangsters like in games or Gangster- Unique gameplay based on free fall- High performance on any device- Convenient management of the game- No Weiss City, only Gangster in free flight- Fascinating drop down- Music that complements the gameplay- Realistic graphics- The best game about Basejumping, Wingsuit and skydiving- Dynamic mapThis is a runner based on free fall, and unlike other runners, there is complete freedom of movement.Attention:Use the joystick on the left side of the screen to move around, and also operate the camera on the right side of the screen to look around.
descriptionHTML:
Grand Stunt Jump San Andreas - an action game with a unique gameplay.

The protagonist is a gangster who was in a state of free fall in a mine filled with various obstacles. Your task is to manage to bypass obstacles in order to prolong the already short life of a real gangster.
But do not think that we threw this dangerous guy into the thick of events without the right to survive. At your disposal will be bonuses that will increase the chances of survival, such as winding time, jerk and others. But whatever you do, this gangsta will still die, the only question is how many meters will he live, falling in an infinitely low mine. Use all your strengths, do not let the bandit break into a cake in the first 10 meters.

Compete with your friends, whose gangster will fly the longest distance! It all depends on your reaction and your skills.

Features of Grand Stunt Jump San Andreas

- 3D game from the third person in the style of San Andreas
- Real gangsters like in games or Gangster
- Unique gameplay based on free fall
- High performance on any device
- Convenient management of the game
- No Weiss City, only Gangster in free flight
- Fascinating drop down
- Music that complements the gameplay
- Realistic graphics
- The best game about Basejumping, Wingsuit and skydiving
- Dynamic map

This is a runner based on free fall, and unlike other runners, there is complete freedom of movement.

Attention:
Use the joystick on the left side of the screen to move around, and also operate the camera on the right side of the screen to look around.
summary: The best simulator of falling real Gangster!
title: Grand Stunt Jump San Andreas

comments: A good concept that needs some work.   The good.   The puzzles gradually ramp up the difficulty.   The visuals and sound are very good for the app.   Some requests   An ad free one time paid version would be nice  The game needs some tool tips. Like if you click on a object in the game. It should tell you some stats. Like power capacity and power requirements.   How about an in game Twitter and or email contact link.   Can power lines please be able to spit off into 2 different directions  The only bad  Too many ads and the ads are too long 30+ seconds.

Lovely little game. Starts out easy showing you the controls/events, but quickly ramps up the puzzle. Speech bubbles get in the way of putting lines down and cause you to lose because you only had 30s to complete the level. Adding an option for a topdown view would solve this because then you could actually see all the directions instead of only 2-3 at a time. Oh and the ads suck. Can we buy a version without them?

What the game is this....everything in the game matters...the no of poles which decides the resistance...the current flow in it indicating potential difference...3 lines conduct more than 2 and single lines...the hurricanes and disconnections indicate open circuit.... I'm an electrical student...finally finished the game...this game is fantastic...just need one more such game from STATNETT...thank you for this game....the other app ohm is also good...plzz develop one more such game!!!!!!!! THE FUTURE IS DEFINITELY ELECTRIC!!!

Creating lines maneuvering needs improvement. It's hard, I have to zoom in just to get it right. But over all, it's a nice game. Now, I get to understand the complexity. Often times, we in our area simply complain about brownouts without knowing the critical planning and action being done in the background. Kudos!
Opened to just a black screen that played music. Absolutely no indication that anything was happening. My screen might as well have been locked, except I could still swipe in the notification bar
description: Without electricity there is chaos. Balance is a free puzzle game about electricity and power grids. Your goal is to make sure there are no blackouts, that the power grids are functional, and that you always produce the right amount of power.The game offers many challenges you probably never thought about: - Did you know that the amount of power produced is changed all day and night to match the amount we use? - Did you know that there is a limit on how much power you can transmit through a single power line without it getting overloaded? - Did you know that an well-built power grid could have any one line disconnected without causing blackouts?You do not need any knowledge about electricity or power grids in order to enjoy this game. Balance is developed by Statnett, the system operator in the Norwegian energy system, and is based on real challenges they work with every day.
descriptionHTML:
Without electricity there is chaos. Balance is a free puzzle game about electricity and power grids. Your goal is to make sure there are no blackouts, that the power grids are functional, and that you always produce the right amount of power.

The game offers many challenges you probably never thought about:
- Did you know that the amount of power produced is changed all day and night to match the amount we use?
- Did you know that there is a limit on how much power you can transmit through a single power line without it getting overloaded?
- Did you know that an well-built power grid could have any one line disconnected without causing blackouts?
You do not need any knowledge about electricity or power grids in order to enjoy this game.

Balance is developed by Statnett, the system operator in the Norwegian energy system, and is based on real challenges they work with every day.
recentChanges: Fixed a few bugs and breaking issues with some of the levels.
summary: Balance is a puzzle game where you build and maintain the power grid.
title: Balance

comments: This game is very interesting. The battles you have against others is good, but I wish the Characters had more verity in they're animations. Also the money you get once you win is too low. Leveling up only takes 2-3 fights. Getting gear to make them stronger takes 3-6 games.   Also; if this game gets an update I want the characters to have voiced lines depending on if they win or lose. As easy as it is to see the negatives there are some positives: game play is smooth and plays just like you want it to.  If it wasn't for the bad rewards I would say this is one of the best games Facebook

Experience an unique mix of crafting & building games with fashion games, music games and dancing games! Start your high school music adventure with crafting & building your own world (from blueprints!) or look for fun in the paradise island of Beach Party Craft! description: Horse survival awaits! Play as numerous horse breeds from zebra to a fantasy unicorn, explore different lands, complete quests and make a horse family in a new animal survival simulator. Enjoy fun and freedom of wild horse in World of Wild Horses: Survival Simulator, ride with your herd and fight for survival!In World of Wild Horses: Survival Simulator you will:CHOOSE YOUR HORSEFrom pony or zebra, to fantasy unicorn or pegasusEXPLORE DIFFERENT LANDSFight for survival from African Savannah to a fantasy realmCOMPLETE QUESTSEach horse has its own adventure - complete them all!RAISE A FAMILYFind mates for your horse, make foals and ride togetherLots of horse breeds!Fight for survival as any horse you want in our simulator - from pony or zebra, to exotic unicorn or pegasus. Each horse has it’s own habitat and quests. Playing as every horse has a load of fun, so try them all in our animals survival simulator!Making a horse family!Fighting for survival together with a horse herd is much easier! Find a horse of your breed, be it zebra, pony or unicorn, to make a herd and raise foals in the survival simulator. To make your horse herd bigger, remember to make your own horse stronger!Explore different lands!Each horse lives in its own land. Go to the hills with any simple horse, to Savannah with zebra or African horse and to a fantasy land with pegasus, unicorn or pony. Horse survival simulator has a lot of places to go and thing to do for your herd!Ride through the different lands with your horse herd in our new horse survival game - World of Wild Horses: Survival Simulator!
descriptionHTML:
Horse survival awaits! Play as numerous horse breeds from zebra to a fantasy unicorn, explore different lands, complete quests and make a horse family in a new animal survival simulator. Enjoy fun and freedom of wild horse in World of Wild Horses: Survival Simulator, ride with your herd and fight for survival!

In World of Wild Horses: Survival Simulator you will:

CHOOSE YOUR HORSE
From pony or zebra, to fantasy unicorn or pegasus

EXPLORE DIFFERENT LANDS
Fight for survival from African Savannah to a fantasy realm

COMPLETE QUESTS
Each horse has its own adventure - complete them all!

RAISE A FAMILY
Find mates for your horse, make foals and ride together

Lots of horse breeds!
Fight for survival as any horse you want in our simulator - from pony or zebra, to exotic unicorn or pegasus. Each horse has it’s own habitat and quests. Playing as every horse has a load of fun, so try them all in our animals survival simulator!

Making a horse family!
Fighting for survival together with a horse herd is much easier! Find a horse of your breed, be it zebra, pony or unicorn, to make a herd and raise foals in the survival simulator. To make your horse herd bigger, remember to make your own horse stronger!

Explore different lands!
Each horse lives in its own land. Go to the hills with any simple horse, to Savannah with zebra or African horse and to a fantasy land with pegasus, unicorn or pony. Horse survival simulator has a lot of places to go and thing to do for your herd!

Ride through the different lands with your horse herd in our new horse survival game - World of Wild Horses: Survival Simulator!
recentChanges: A big addition to the herd comes with a major update including:
- New big locations: hillside and Savannah
summary: Join the biggest horse herd of the world in a new animal survival simulator!

descriptionHTML:
Buff up the Bodybuilder is an innovative "clicker" with a completely original theme and fun gameplay!

So you didn't manage to buff up for summer this year? You're hardly in the best shape? Then this game is just for you!

Over the course of the entire game you will walk the exciting path of the bodybuilder after starting from the very bottom.
You've got a chance to buff up a skinny dweeb until he becomes a real bodybuilder with massive biceps and a six-pack, all while buying and upgrading your exercise equipment.

In this game you can not only buff up your character, but also compete with your friends in contest mode.

The variety of exercise equipment will surprise even the most hardcore clicker fanatics. Eventually you can also upgrade your apartment and even buy a gym membership.

You can also track your progress and unlock achievements as you play.

AND IT'S FREE!

The game features:
๏ AN EXCITING PATH from dweeb to beefcake!
๏ BUY EXERCISE EQUIPMENT that will help you buff up your bodybuilder!

๏ YOUR BODYBUILDER CAN GET RIDICULOUSLY BIG!
๏ NICE SOUNDTRACK!

comments: This is a great game with good ideas. Don't listen to those people who say it's bad as its not. There are some flaws, mainly in the fact that there are only a few maps so more maps would be nice. Also, it would be nice if you could change the name or if there is a way, tell me. There are other slightly bad things but overall a great game.

Great concept the only thing wrong with it is the slow movement's that happens some Times during the game hope  that you all fix it. Another thing is the lack of stages there are only four to three stages and all of them are with ice add more and I guarantee your that your ratings is going to rise. Finally the option to change your name at the main screen and better control's than just jumping. Would love to play it once these issues are fixed and I don't mean to be harsh hope you all got my opinions

The graphics are perfect for the style, but attacks should be more under your contract with weapons, and variation without. I also can't find the Bluetooth multiplayer hinted by the Bluetooth connection permissions. Is that a later feature? If so please add soon!

The AI's are OP and there is no point in playing the game. Its a much better idea to just buy the real game on steam instead. 100x better

Why use your own creative ideas when you can rip it off of an actual game that's fun and worth your time? Either I'm tripping or the play store has extremely low expectations and will welcome even the most crappy and unoriginal game the world has ever seen, cause that's what it is.
I like it. But there are things that could be better. Like changing the names. Actually online players not bots. More customizable characters.

descriptionHTML:
Start your construction today! Create your infinite fictional world!

Enjoy this endless paradise.

Build, destroy, move, fly, jump and craft. And all this for free !!!

There are over 100 different items in your inventory to build separate rooms including a living room, bedroom, toilet, bathroom, a private garden, a house for animals.

Easily place the standard blocks that you want to install and use them to build something, you can build everything you can imagine.

Choose creativity or survival mode, move through your world and make it more remarkable.

Move through this endless world in flight, save your work, and play again later.

Everyone loves Kraft games, they have become popular all over the world; You can start with a few blocks and gradually build an empire.

Explore and start developing your dream. You can use many different items, so you can create your ideal Kingdom. The game is infinite, which makes it so intriguing.

★★★★★ PLEASE RATE THIS GAME WITH 5 STARS★★★★★

For those who still see the error at the beginning. Go into the settings of your phone. Selects programs and games. Look for our game: Exploration Prime. Choose this. Then you can grant permissions to the game. Then you need to give the game permission to write to your storage. After that, the game will work.

Enjoy!

The game Exploration Prime is an open source project which is subject to the LGPLv3 license. Before using the code, you must read the entire license and agree to it.

comments: I play this game regularly, and I enjoy the differing modes available. You can play happily without paying for any additional content, however at higher levels paying will help you progress. By this time you will have poured hours into it, so I do not think it is unreasonable. Save your gold until later levels (player level 15+) and you can get by without in game purchases for quite a while.

I absolutely love this game. Turn based tactics are one of my favourite types of games. Since playing the game more I've decided that there's not enough gas for me to be able to enjoy the game like I want to. I think the car should either hold more, or gas should be easier to get. This is just a game that already has inconsistencies with reality. Otherwise I love the game

Just loved it... I am at council level 18 now... Weapon upgrade xp cost should be reduced or just remove workshop. No use of WORKSHOP with such high xp cost because its REASONABLE to upgrade your SURVIVOR than their WEAPONS.... Please for next update reduce weapon upgrade cost....

I've been playing this game for two years now and I can never put it down. It's such an amazing game. I'd like it even more though if the characters we originally fell in love with were available. Like Andrea, T-Dog, Lori, etc.

I like this game, but the reason I'm giving it a 2 star rating because the game can't load. After the first time I played it, when I went to play it again it froze. I've been waiting at the game to load for like 5 minutes and decided that the game was broken. Can I get help, I might change my rating.

Great time waster. Wish the gas would increase quicker. Hero's are pretty easy to get after a while. Freemium aspects of the game not shoved down your throat they are there but not essential (So far) LVL 25
description: Play now with Daryl, Rick, Michonne and many other characters of AMC’s The Walking Dead! Collect Heroes through radio calls and unlock special abilities and valuable leader traits. Complete Episode 1 for free Daryl tokens and unlock the first Hero of your team!The Walking Dead: No Man’s Land is a thrilling, action-packed RPG where tactical choices make the difference between life and death. Only the strongest will survive so choose your team wisely: bring Michonne and dominate in close-quarter combat or send Rick to dispatch enemies from afar. Or perhaps you’ll choose to snipe from a distance with Daryl’s crossbow, or mow the herd down with Abraham’s assault rifle. • FIGHT through hordes of deadly enemies in tactical turn-based combat• COLLECT and upgrade your favorite characters from AMC’s The Walking Dead• CHOOSE the right team and the equipment for each mission• HUNT walkers in Terminus, The Prison and other familiar locations from AMC’s The Walking Dead • JOIN other players in deadly weekly challenges and PVP combat for exclusive rewards“Throw in some pretty swish graphics, lovely animations and blood splatters, and you have one of the most carefully fleshed out zombie games we've seen on mobile. It looks lovely, and plays great too.” - Pocketgamer“Each aspect of survival on AMC's The Walking Dead has been parallel to the series' official mobile game, subtitled No Man's Land.” - Mashable“Imagine your favorite mobile base-building strategy game, mix in a dash of XCOM, and then paint on a fresh coat of AMC’s The Walking Dead. That’s No Man’s Land in a nutshell.” - GamezeboFor more, please visit:http://www.facebook.com/thewalkingdeadnomanslandhttp://twitter.com/twdnomanslandhttp://www.thewalkingdeadnomansland.comhttp://www.youtube.com/nxtgmsFor player support, please visit:nextgames.helpshift.com

description: Talking Cat Run - Talking Kitty Kitten is an exciting, FREE endless talking running game for boys and girls of all ages. Talking Cat Run - Talking Kitty Kitten is specifically designed for children and families who want to enjoy and play with the coolest and cutest kittens in the world!😻Talking Cat Run - Talking Kitty Kitten Features 🙀- Dash, slide and jump to dodge obstacles and animals - don't talk!- Chase the rainbow and catch coins with the coin boost- Choose from 12 unique Kitty Cats, each with different accessories- Equip the rainbow shield to smash through obstacles!- Use a variety of exciting power ups to reach the high score- Unlock new upgrades, cats and boosts in the shop with your coins- Come back every day to complete tasks and earn exclusive rewards- Great graphics and performance- Free updates: New features and characters implemented regularlyChoose your favourite Kitty kitten and guide them through the forest and city as you try to collect as many coins as possible.Run, jump, dash and slide to dodge obstacles and keep your Tom kitty safe in this endless cat racing simulator game, where fast reactions will be required if you want to reach the highscore! Run, surf and slide for as long as you can to earn more points, and collect powerups to double your score! Will you be able to reach the high score in Tom Talking Cat Run - Talking Kitty Kitten?In Talking Cat Run - Talking Kitty Kitten once you and your cute kitty have collected enough coins, you will be able to chase the rainbow for a HUGE number of coins as the coin boost starts. Watch coins fall from the sky as you try to collect them all!After you have finished running in Talking Cat Run - Talking Kitty Kitten, you can visit the store where 12 kitties are waiting for you to unlock them. Try and collect exciting cats such as Tom, Salem the witches cat, Jess the post cat and even Princess, the most royal cat in the land! As well as Cats, you can upgrade your powerups, buy extra boosts or even purchase headstarts so that you can whizz straight to the front of the pack on your next run! Reaching the highscore is more possible than reaching the end of a ball of wool with all of these upgrades in Talking Cat Run - Talking Kitty Kitten!Subway trains, temple ruins and city streets can all be dangerous for a cute little kitty, so don’t forget to double tap the screen and activate the rainbow shield if you are going to crash! description: Optical illusions spiral is a fun game which can produce optical illusions. The illusions shall make you see the objects around you deformed in different shapes, depending on the illusion. Your friends and family shall also be amused once they try the app. For making the optical illusions spirals game more fun, the game Spiral Shooter Game is included to allow you obtain new illusion effects. Pass levels on the Spiral Shooter Game in order to achieve the final goal of getting all the illusion effects.*** Disclaimer: Don’t use this app if you are sensible to stroboscopic images. Don’t allow another people using the app if you are not sure about their stroboscopic images sensitiveness. ***How to useSelect one illusion (initially only the uppermost one is available) then get ready and keep your mobile device (phone or tablet) about 25 cm in front of your eyes, then follow the instructions stated on the game, they will guide you on the process and shall provide tips on how to improve the visual effect. Once the spiral visual effect starts its movement a counter shall show on the center of the screen the time remaining you should keep looking at the screen of your mobile device. 30 seconds is an amount of time which we have tested and works fine on the majority of devices we have used during the test time. During those 30 seconds you can focus on different ways on the screen, any way you focus your eyes on it shall be fine to achieve the goal expected after the counter reaches zero. Once the time is over, then look at some object around you in a middle distance, then you should be able of seeing the optical illusion effects. In case you haven’t achieved seeing the effects, you can answer how was the result of your try in the game, and extra tips shall be given in such a case.The Spiral Shooter GameThis fun game is an awesome casual game which is included to match the theme of the game and give the chance of unlocking new optical effects spirals. The goal is throwing the set of initial balls to the central circle, but be careful since if 2 balls touch then you lose. The central circle rotates both clockwise and counterclockwise, can change the direction at any time and the speed shall vary. You have to find your own strategy in order of getting rid of all the balls given at the beginning of each level. Each level shall not contain a random move but shall keep the same set of moves each time the user plays the same level. Some features of the game:100 levels. When some new visual effects spirals are added, some more level might be added too.Single tap controls. Tap anywhere on the screen but on the central circle. As you tap on the screen a ball will be shot.Casual game style. Close the game at any level you are playing. The last level unlocked shall be kept that way forever.Simple minimalist graphics. Simple to don’t distract you from your real goal.Also remember that the goal of passing levels on the game, besides getting fun playing it, is unlocking new visual illusions. Click on any locked visual illusion in order to get to know how many levels you need to pass in order to obtain a new optical illusion available.We hope you enjoy the app. Keep in mind our disclaimer about stroboscopic images sensitiveness.We appreciate any feedback that help us improve the app. Your ideas are welcome. Ratings, reviews and emails are welcome too.
descriptionHTML:
Optical illusions spiral is a fun game which can produce optical illusions. The illusions shall make you see the objects around you deformed in different shapes, depending on the illusion. Pass levels on the Spiral Shooter Game in order to achieve the final goal of getting all the illusion effects.

*** Disclaimer: Don’t use this app if you are sensible to stroboscopic images. Don’t allow another people using the app if you are not sure about their stroboscopic images sensitiveness. ***

How to use
Select one illusion (initially only the uppermost one is available) then get ready and keep your mobile device (phone or tablet) about 25 cm in front of your eyes, then follow the instructions stated on the game, they will guide you on the process and shall provide tips on how to improve the visual effect. Once the spiral visual effect starts its movement a counter shall show on the center of the screen the time remaining you should keep looking at the screen of your mobile device. 30 seconds is an amount of time which we have tested and works fine on the majority of devices we have used during the test time. During those 30 seconds you can focus on different ways on the screen, any way you focus your eyes on it shall be fine to achieve the goal expected after the counter reaches zero. Once the time is over, then look at some object around you in a middle distance, then you should be able of seeing the optical illusion effects. In case you haven’t achieved seeing the effects, you can answer how was the result of your try in the game, and extra tips shall be given in such a case.

The Spiral Shooter Game
This fun game is an awesome casual game which is included to match the theme of the game and give the chance of unlocking new optical effects spirals. The goal is throwing the set of initial balls to the central circle, but be careful since if 2 balls touch then you lose. The central circle rotates both clockwise and counterclockwise, can change the direction at any time and the speed shall vary. You have to find your own strategy in order of getting rid of all the balls given at the beginning of each level. Each level shall not contain a random move but shall keep the same set of moves each time the user plays the same level. Some features of the game:
100 levels. When some new visual effects spirals are added, some more level might be added too.
Single tap controls. Tap anywhere on the screen but on the central circle. As you tap on the screen a ball will be shot.
Casual game style. Close the game at any level you are playing. The last level unlocked shall be kept that way forever.
Simple minimalist graphics. Simple to don’t distract you from your real goal.

Also remember that the goal of passing levels on the game, besides getting fun playing it, is unlocking new visual illusions. Click on any locked visual illusion in order to get to know how many levels you need to pass in order to obtain a new optical illusion available.

We hope you enjoy the app. Keep in mind our disclaimer about stroboscopic images sensitiveness.

We appreciate any feedback that help us improve the app. Your ideas are welcome. Ratings, reviews and emails are welcome too.
summary: Optical illusions spiral. Look at screen and enjoy the visual illusions
title: Spiral: Optical Illusions

Put together new looks for the dolls: glam, trendy, classy, traditional, fancy, casual or other. These gorgeous women are fabulously rich and don't have to worry about maxing out their credit cards! With their great sense of fashion and style, these fashionistas pick the best places to shop and the most expensive beauty salon to do their hairstyle at.Unlike most other fashionista games out there, there are no in-app purchases, and you can't spend any real money here. It's a truly free dressup game. That's also true for all our other makeover / cosplay apps. Just follow the "More by Games For Girls" link to our new styling games. Train your skills and tastes as an outfit designer. Learn to express yourself and show other people your inner personality and uniqueness with the way you look. If you're more into youth's urban clothing, be sure to check "College Student", "High School". For more glamor stuff, models and celebrities, download "Beauty Queen", "Prom Night" and "Model Wedding".Unleash your inner shopaholic and imagine you are a top super model or a celebrity (famous actress, movie superstar, pop icon, or a reality show star)! Try various outfits and makeovers with each glamour doll.

comments: On the advert it looks like the best game and I get two disco balls each time and merge them together and you've completed the level. Then you get the game and that rarely even happens! It's only happened once to me and I'm on level 41. Now that's saying something. It gives you a super good promise and nope it's gone out the window as soon as you get the game

Although this game is addictive and sometimes fun, it seems the producers of the game are greedily taking advantage of people and getting them to pay money for things not worth it(but they feel the pressure to do so, so they do it). Some things in this game are deliberately set up to make the player fail and become desperate to play on and spend. The Champions League is a poor idea which produces terrible prizes for high ranks, and is just a replay of previous played levels which is a let down.

I completely love this game and I would play it again. But I got one problem that one will help me reinstall my Google Play Store. My phone was reset to the factory state. And now there is something wrong with my Google Play Store. And no one will help me reinstall it I have asked for help on several occasions through Google but no reply

It's fast and fun so much better than the other new ones. I love playing it. Thank u so much for all your work and the time spent making it a blast to play.  PS getting past level 80 isn't  possible so I quit. Made me so sad.

The scene at the end of the level is annoying and takes 5 seconds to play out. Then you have to wait for it to load back to show your stars getting in your chest and your coins. It would be better if it just proceeded to the next level saving about 30 seconds. All that to say, it's an addicting game.

Oh my gosh, this game is so much fun! I have a dentist appointment coming up, so I got this game to settle my nerves. I'm having such a good time playing, I know this will be just the thing to help me out! 😀 Thank you 😄

descriptionHTML:

description: Get ready to take control of big rig trucks, 4x4 offroad trucks, and more in a huge forest and mountain environment: 16 km² area, 30 km of roads to drive on!Accomplish tons of unique missions to be a top offroad truck driver in one of the best truck driving simulators!!! Truck Simulator 4x4 Offroad contains 20 action-packed truck driving levels !!Drive all-new 4x4 trucks and grab hold of the steering wheel to experience truck driving simulators like never seen before. Experience the realistic truck driving in tough muddy hill climb sections, using 4x4 offroad driving, you can conquer driving 4x4 trucks in the most realistic truck simulator!Explore a whole new massive open world map, filled with tons of beautiful vistas to explore in the best offroad truck simulator. Drive up close to waterfall cascades and a lake, an ancient temple, a small airport, countryside houses and farms, ruins, camping sites, and loads more... Drive on roads that vary from 2x2 lanes to very small dirt road up mountains, with a 4x4 offroad hill climb.Play awesome missions like:- Tow broke down 4x4 vehicles with your offroad truck- Transport important cargo across the countryside- Hill climb up muddy mountains with 4x4 offroad truck driving- Race at high speed against offroad dune buggy racers- Chase and pursue other 4x4 trucks in offroad pursuits- Rescue injured climbers up mountain hill climb- Stop and catch dangerous truck drivers- Race against busy traffic and angry drivers - Clear the roads by ramming objects with your offroad truck- Drive on tricky obstacle courses as fast as possibleFeatures:- Huge open world, filled with wide open roads, mountains, and forests- Realistic 4x4 driving truck simulator- Realistic off-road driving physics- High-quality 4x4 vehicles- Dynamic camera angles, control any angle!- Easy to play driving controls, use touch, wheel and tilt controls!You can adjust the quality button to play without lag.
