description: Amazing Crime Strange Stickman is a grand city simulator in third person view (and FPS mode), where you drive a car or a motorbike / bike and become a real boss driver. Exciting gameplay: you are waiting for the most hotspots of criminality in Vega disctrict. You play is a mad future unknown hero / legend and whole city fears you. The style of city is similar to Miami, Andreas, London or Las Vegas but actualy it's New York. Become a chief on the streets of anti criminality in town. Be ready to investigate huge theft. Are your ready for great anti criminal adventure? Be ready to rob, kill, clash, shoot thugs and fight all the criminals! Spider police and swat will help you. Stealing auto cars, racing through streets, and shooting down gangsters. Do you have enough guts to rise to the top of the criminal piles? Try out all the supercars and bikes. Make stunts on a bmx or find an ultimate F-90 tank or devastating battle helicopter. You can also buy a lot of Gtw things in a shop to help you complete missions and release the city from all mafia sinners.Become Qta citizen hope as a standard of pure law and justice, or come to the city as a new doom knight. Most of the missions will be on the begas streets, some will be in chinatown district and other gang lands etc. You were on a Incredible superhero secret mission, stealing the important information about the enemies, the army base camps, rebels and the underworld Mafia. You will fight various star mafia gangsters from America, Russia, China, Mexico, Japan etc. The game contains fully Open world Environment. Explore the big city, go off-roading in the mountains, steal and drive super cars, shoot guns and more in this free open world game! Explore the crime city, full of gangs and aggressive fractions. Don't mess with the police, they are the good ones. Good old story about an anti car thief in a dangerous town. Dominate the city with a devastating fire power of advanced military vehicles or upgrade your hero to knock down enemies in a few kicks! Let it be as a beautiful city, do not turn into crime city with blood and robbery.You have special real tga powers. You can shoot dangerous laser beam from your san eyes. You can shoot a rope to a building and climb over the building to the top. Your legs are also very powerful. Don't underestimate them. • Visually stunning urban graphics, character and army vehicle models, Helicopter, Air fighter, autobot etc.• HD quality graphics• Hours of gameplay on the battleground where you have to survive and be the last man standing• Ingame war craft shop• Guns to buy and shoot• Off road terrains to explore• Realistic car drifting• One of the best free play games / allgames / topgame

comments: I love this game and I play it all day long. I love the game play in it as it's very addictive and all the awards you get motivates you to keep playing on and achieving higher levels. I gave this a four star rating because the only problem with this game is how much is crashes and struggles to maintain server connection. You can restart the game and it'll fix but it'll happen very easily again and there's even times you have to restart the game multiple times for it to work again. If this game will be able to maintain server connection at all times and not crash as much then this game will be worth five stars and more people will play it guaranteed.
EZ PZ CRASH n FREEZY  Seriously servers can't maintain a connection for more then 3 minutes.. literally log in, do one thing, time out, relog repeat.. don't waste your time or money on this
Now I give 1 star. How can you enjoy and play a game if it crashes all the time? I can only play 5 minutes and then it crashes. WORST GAME EVER

It is very buggy. At times when you do something it will crash and keep trying to load it. Making you have to close and reopen. Not recommended making any in game until fixed. In game purchases work on Chinese tier system. More you buy better stuff you get.

I like the game. It's fun and can keep you busy for hours at a time or you can leave it alone for long stretches. Like most of the reviewers have said, it suffers from server stability issues. Most of the time it's not a problem, but I just had a issue where the game crashed and lost a days worth of progress and daily items. That needs to be  fixed if this game has any chance to succeed.

description: Become a celebrated sniper hero in American Block Sniper Survival. This brutal running and shooting action game stars you as a sniper of a deadly operation. Trek through a devastated war torn city in pursuit of the enemy. Only once your objective has been met can you all the mission a success. ****READY YOUR WEAPONS****They would descend upon villages, bringing fire and death with them. Grave after grave... I couldn't bear to be a part of that anymore. The issue was so big, so consuming, and the world had forgotten about the horrors confronted on the battlefield: a child's burnt sock on the side of the road, blood spattered alleyways, the haunting stench of death and the ring of a report playing on repeat in your head as you try to sleep at night... and the look on the target's face as the blood drained from his body. But it this was war, and the law of a good soldier was a lack of feeling. Numbing my emotions and attachments to the people and places I visited was a challenge, but I soon realized the benefit... because now I was unstoppable.**** INTENSE GAME PLAY **** Launch a fun, fast-paced 3D mobile gaming experience upon downloading this addictive FPS game. Strike fast and kill enemies in this combat challenge. Collect ammo and HP pickups as you advance. These pickups will decrease though, while the number of enemies increases significantly. This ultimate battle offers the option to go at it hand-to-hand or with a range of melee and firearm weapons. The choice is yours. Choose your difficulty, earn power-ups by completing quick tasks and unlock levels on the mission map select. Features:-Pixel cube graphics-Six levels to conquer -Precision aiming -Radar map-Health meter -Perks & power-ups-Blocky weapon collect
descriptionHTML:
Become a celebrated sniper hero in American Block Sniper Survival. This brutal running and shooting action game stars you as a sniper of a deadly operation. Trek through a devastated war torn city in pursuit of the enemy. Only once your objective has been met can you all the mission a success.

****READY YOUR WEAPONS****
They would descend upon villages, bringing fire and death with them. Grave after grave... I couldn't bear to be a part of that anymore. The issue was so big, so consuming, and the world had forgotten about the horrors confronted on the battlefield: a child's burnt sock on the side of the road, blood spattered alleyways, the haunting stench of death and the ring of a report playing on repeat in your head as you try to sleep at night... and the look on the target's face as the blood drained from his body. But it this was war, and the law of a good soldier was a lack of feeling. Numbing my emotions and attachments to the people and places I visited was a challenge, but I soon realized the benefit... because now I was unstoppable.

**** INTENSE GAME PLAY ****
Launch a fun, fast-paced 3D mobile gaming experience upon downloading this addictive FPS game. Strike fast and kill enemies in this combat challenge. Collect ammo and HP pickups as you advance. These pickups will decrease though, while the number of enemies increases significantly. This ultimate battle offers the option to go at it hand-to-hand or with a range of melee and firearm weapons. The choice is yours. Choose your difficulty, earn power-ups by completing quick tasks and unlock levels on the mission map select.

Features:
-Pixel cube graphics
-Six levels to conquer
-Precision aiming
-Radar map
-Health meter
-Perks & power-ups
-Blocky weapon collect

description: It is Guide for Subway Surf(地鐵跑酷)A funny running game. The picture of the game is gorgeous and exquisite, the color is a lot of people feel very comfortable, in operation is very smooth, and clean and agile. A simple upstroke, a downward stroke, a left and right stroke to avoid obstacles and oncoming trains, help the hero escape the fiery police and his dog's manhunt. It can also change direction in the air, and it can be added to life by double-clicking on the screen to get the skateboard out. The game also includes a variety of props such as spring shoes.

comments: The controls are more difficult than the last time I played this game, which was a year or so ago. I don't know whether it is because of my phone or if it is in the app. Nevertheless good job, game is very addictive, keep up the good work 👌

this game is a thousand times better than agar.io in my opinion! It's so much easier to get onto the leader board. Every time I play I get onto the leader board. It's just so addicting and I can't get enough. Everyone in my family loves it too. Creating your own skin is a great option as well. My only complaint is that the 'play online' option is very laggy, and if you fix it would be much appreciated. Thanks for a great game, from sinéad, ella, lauren, mollie, shane and ollie 😊😊

This is better than the browser version for multiple reasons. 1) It doesn't lag as much. I played a few rounds a noticed a little bit of lag, but it's better than the browser version.  2) You can play against AI if you don't want to play against people. I like this because I actually had a chance to win and was able to kill some. 3) You can create your own custom skin, which is awesome. All of this is free as well. I love this version of Slither.io.

So I think just about everyone has heard of this game... Buuuuuuut there are some newbies here so I'll explain. Its a multiplayer game and It's in my opinion that It is probibly #2 best game I've ever played. Great concept and I like to get creative on makeing a snake/worm thing. A+ grade. 👌👍

Playing this game is total fun. But It would be more Awesome if there will be some sounds & a pause button maybe. One more thing, somebody tell me how to BOOST the Slither because everyone is boosting except me😭😌😶🙄😓😑😫🙃

The controlls are pretty bad considering how simple they are.  The lag is unbearable. Fix those and you've got a 5star game all day. Simple fun pick up and put down time killer. In fact the lag is such an issue however, the game is getting uninstalled. You can't play a reaction based game when the lag has you 6 seconds behind whats going on.

description: This game is perfect for learning all the countries' capitals or for testing you knowledge: -	Several game modes are available: world quiz, quiz by contient... -	And a challenge for those who like competition! -      You can review and learn the countries' capitals using the list mode. -	It contains the capitals of the 199 countries. -	It is user friendly.When playing quiz, the point of the game is to get as many correct answers as possible, with 3 wrong answers allowed.When playing challenge, you have a limited time to guess a maximum capitals possible.Will you succeed to reach the best score?
descriptionHTML:
This game is perfect for learning all the countries' capitals or for testing you knowledge:
- Several game modes are available: world quiz, quiz by contient...
- And a challenge for those who like competition!
- You can review and learn the countries' capitals using the list mode.
- It contains the capitals of the 199 countries.
- It is user friendly.

When playing quiz, the point of the game is to get as many correct answers as possible, with 3 wrong answers allowed.
When playing challenge, you have a limited time to guess a maximum capitals possible.

Will you succeed to reach the best score?
summary: Quiz of the countries' capitals of the world
title: Capitals of the countries - Quiz

description: Second part of the legendary Cut the Rope logic puzzles series. Get it now for free!Cut the Rope 2 is a part of the iconic Cut the Rope franchise by ZeptoLab, which follows the adventures of Om Nom, a cute green creature that adores candies.Meet Om Nom's friends - the Nommies - and hop on the amazing journey through more than 160 levels that will take you through lush forests, busy cities, junkyards and underground tunnels, all in pursuit of one goal – CANDY!Familiar to play, yet challenging to master, Cut the Rope 2 brings fresh mind bending challenges and unanticipated obstacles to the casual phenomenon loved by preschool children and adults alike! Keep your brain fit and boost your problem solving skills by mastering the tricky levels based on real-life physics. Tired of mind game? Just sit back and enjoy the cheerful and relaxing game atmosphere of one of the most beautiful free educational apps for kids. Find 7 new characters, the Nommies, to help you solve puzzles.ALL NEW HATS TO BRAG ABOUT! Customize Om Nom, choose your favorite candy and select your finger traces.ALL NEW ADVENTURES FOR OM NOM! Experience completely new graphics, sound and gameplay elements, including the ability to move Om Nom. MEET OM NOM’S NEW FRIENDS, THE NOMMIES!  • Roto can carry Om Nom to the best candy catching locations. Download Cut the Rope 2 now for free!About ZeptoLab:ZeptoLab is a global gaming and entertainment company best known for developing the award-winning, hit franchise Cut the Rope, which includes Cut the Rope, Cut the Rope: Experiments, Cut the Rope: Time Travel, Cut the Rope 2 and Cut the Rope: Magic. Cut the Rope games have been downloaded more than one billion times by users around the world since the first game's debut in October 2010. The company has also released King of Thieves, a massive multiplayer mobile title with more than 50 million downloads so far, as well as Pudding Monsters and My Om Nom games

comments: I absolutely love love LOVE this game. Im no bot i swear. This game is so addictive. Gameplay is great. A few suggestions however. Sometimes i find my "sword" just going right through some fish, and it doesnt kill them. Also, maybe switch up some ways to get Stars. I find myself saving so much to get the 99k sword fish and never buy any other fishes. I feel like the players should work their way up slowly and not have to play with only the "daily reward" fishes. Just my suggestion  Thank you guys!

Great game, good servers, rarely any lag, and addicting. However, the price for characters is pretty steep, their not even worth buying since you'll get better daily characters by the time you have enough stars to buy a good character. Save up for the end game characters. Also, the left joystick is fairly close to the edge of the screen and makes it a little hard to stay on the screen. You get use to it after a while but it would be nice to have other control setups or custom controls.
Great game. Just the spawns on Kill the King and stuff suck since people can spawn right in you. Also, it is kinda rigged when you have the default fish vs someone with one of the best ones.

description: Pixel Swordfish.io is a game about cute creatures piercing each other. Dash to your enemy and kill them!Your goal is become the creature with biggest nose in the world.If your nose touches another player, he will explode and you will get another point. But if others run into YOU, then you are defeated and game is over.In Pixel Sword fish .io game, you have a chance to win even if you have tiny nose. You can attack from sides or rear of a much larger and bigger nose player to defeat them, no matter how big your nose are!HOW TO PLAY:Control with Joystick your direction.Using a boost button (the lower right corner of the screen) can make your worm creature to run faster with higher speed but running fast will reduce your energy! (need time to fill it up).Dash into opponents like a arrow and Kill enemies to rise your nose and get stars. Popup the balloons to get more stars. Get characters with different noses in shop.Pixel Sword Fish io game have 6 modes:* Classic --- you are fight with other worms collecting stars, rise and evolve your tusk, trying to earn trophy to unlock next Arena.* Team play --- players dived on and each team have a ticket count so when there is no more ticket you can't revive until game over.  * Survival --- 50 crazy players in one room! The rule is simple one life, you don't have another chance !* Kill the king -- in this little rom one is a king with big tusk and body and other players trying to kill him to became the new king so defend yourself or attack depends who you are on that time.* Smash --- overcrowded tiny room with angry players you should be very fast with good reactions to survive in that insanity, no escape from this place .* One sword pro --- only true masters who are really fast (who craft more than 1200 trophies) are allowed to play in that room only one sword characters are allowed no slither movements are welcome here. So, what are you waiting for? get this cool new app now!Develop your battle skills start the war and try to survive in crowded and dangerous water world.*Attention this app requires good internet connection!* If you have any idea or suggestion please contact us on Facebook
descriptionHTML:
Pixel Swordfish.io is a game about cute creatures piercing each other.
Dash to your enemy and kill them!
Your goal is become the creature with biggest nose in the world.If your nose touches another player, he will explode and you will get another point. But if others run into YOU, then you are defeated and game is over.
In Pixel Sword fish .io game, you have a chance to win even if you have tiny nose. You can attack from sides or rear of a much larger and bigger nose player to defeat them, no matter how big your nose are!

HOW TO PLAY:
Control with Joystick your direction.
Using a boost button (the lower right corner of the screen) can make your worm creature to run faster with higher speed but running fast will reduce your energy! (need time to fill it up).
Dash into opponents like a arrow and Kill enemies to rise your nose and get stars. Popup the balloons to get more stars. Get characters with different noses in shop.

Pixel Sword Fish io game have 6 modes:
* Classic --- you are fight with other worms collecting stars, rise and evolve your tusk, trying to earn trophy to unlock next Arena.
* Team play --- players dived on and each team have a ticket count so when there is no more ticket you can't revive until game over.
* Survival --- 50 crazy players in one room! The rule is simple one life, you don't have another chance !
* Kill the king -- in this little rom one is a king with big tusk and body and other players trying to kill him to became the new king so defend yourself or attack depends who you are on that time.
* Smash --- overcrowded tiny room with angry players you should be very fast with good reactions to survive in that insanity, no escape from this place .
* One sword pro --- only true masters who are really fast (who craft more than 1200 trophies) are allowed to play in that room only one sword characters are allowed no slither movements are welcome here.

So, what are you waiting for? get this cool new app now!
Develop your battle skills start the war and try to survive in crowded and dangerous water world.

*Attention this app requires good internet connection!
* If you have any idea or suggestion please contact us on Facebook
summary: Dash to your enemy and kill them! Pixel cute creatures piercing each other.
title: Pixel Sword Fish io

Then this simulator is for you!Carry children and their parents from home to school and back.Remember - you are responsible for the lives of the passengers you carry!Smoothly accelerate and slow down, without disturbing the comfort of transported people.Stopping at the stations, make sure that all people enter, no one should be late for lessons!Get experience points and change to more modern electric trains!Open all the presented locomotives for a more successful passage of the game.Metro is one of the fastest modes of transport, capable of transporting passengers to destinations without any traffic jams in a very short time!On the straight sections of the route, accelerate to the maximum speed.Come to the cabin of the train!  - Modern 3D graphics will give a lot of unforgettable impressions.- The mechanics of the electric train control is as close as possible to the real one.- A detailed environment will please even experienced players!- View from the cockpit will allow you to immerse yourself in the gameplay.- Qualitative soundtrack will create the atmosphere of the metro.  Share your comments and leave ratings!Start playing now!
descriptionHTML:
Subway School Children Simulator
Metro Train Train School Children Simulator - build a career as a subway mechanic.
Do you like to manage different techniques? Then this simulator is for you!
Carry children and their parents from home to school and back.
Remember - you are responsible for the lives of the passengers you carry!
Smoothly accelerate and slow down, without disturbing the comfort of transported people.
Stopping at the stations, make sure that all people enter, no one should be late for lessons!
Get experience points and change to more modern electric trains!
Open all the presented locomotives for a more successful passage of the game.
Metro is one of the fastest modes of transport, capable of transporting passengers to destinations without any traffic jams in a very short time!
On the straight sections of the route, accelerate to the maximum speed.
Come to the cabin of the train!

- Modern 3D graphics will give a lot of unforgettable impressions.
- The mechanics of the electric train control is as close as possible to the real one.
- A detailed environment will please even experienced players!
- View from the cockpit will allow you to immerse yourself in the gameplay.
- Qualitative soundtrack will create the atmosphere of the metro.

Share your comments and leave ratings!
Start playing now!
summary: Subway School Children Simulator
title: Subway School Children Simulator

description: Paw Puppy Subway Patrol is an awesome infinity running game.A Puppy runs and plays to complete his journey to the city, Help Him to run and collect all coins and gifts by pass so many obstacles.He must run on the city to find coin and magic items (shoes, copters, magnet ...).Don't forget to dodge all obstacles in the way.Run as fast as possible.*** Game Features ***+ Easy one-touch controls and gameplay+ Fantastic 3D toon graphics+ Rich background music and sound effects+ Nice sounds.+ Intense and exciting game rhythm+ More bonus with items: magnet, surfing, magic shoes, jetpack surf.*** HOW TO PLAY ***+ Drag left, right to change the lane+ Drag up to jump+ Tap to hit obstacles+ Drag down to slideEnjoy!
descriptionHTML:
Paw Puppy Subway Patrol is an awesome infinity running game.
A Puppy runs and plays to complete his journey to the city, Help Him to run and collect all coins and gifts by pass so many obstacles.
He must run on the city to find coin and magic items (shoes, copters, magnet ...).
Don't forget to dodge all obstacles in the way.
Run as fast as possible.

*** Game Features ***
+ Easy one-touch controls and gameplay
+ Fantastic 3D toon graphics
+ Rich background music and sound effects
+ Nice sounds.
+ Intense and exciting game rhythm
+ More bonus with items: magnet, surfing, magic shoes, jetpack surf.


*** HOW TO PLAY ***
+ Drag left, right to change the lane
+ Drag up to jump
+ Tap to hit obstacles
+ Drag down to slide


Enjoy!
summary: Paw Puppy Subway Patrol is an awesome infinity running game.
title: Paw Puppy Subway Patrol

description: The last day commando survival is an ultimate action-packed commando shooting game full of FPS action and thrill. The game is based on most realistic commando shooting missions with beautiful 3D graphics and animations. You are playing as a last commando of the elite commando force and you are specially launched in the enemy base camp. As you are the last commando, so you are the only hope left for your country defense. So, be ready for the extreme survival shooting missions 2018 and show your perfect gorilla commando skills to eliminate all the enemies’ base camps. So go ahead commando, kill your treacherous enemies and save the area. The battle has begun, get ready for the ultimate IGI counter terrorist missions and lead the elite frontline commando force to ambush and eliminate the enemy headquarters for pride and honor. There is no place left to escape. Enemies have captured your land and basecamps, now it's a survival war between army men soldier & global terrorist enemies so fight as your last day at the battle on earth in this cool last survival game and take revenge from your rivals.Now, in last day commando survival, you are the only captain commando who can be a real warrior commando in these crazy commando games 2018. Load your guns and turn the base into the battlefield to save your nation from this last day battleground enemies. The final mission can be your last day on earth commando. In this mission, the terrorist and enemies strikes are on the peak. The enemy will try to encounter you with real surgical strikes and modern combat actions. You have to show the ultimate shooting skills and theft the important things of enemies through the art of war last day from the battlefield. Commando adventure FPS shooting 3D game consists of total twelve levels. All the levels have different missions to complete, after completion of a level next level will be unlocked. Total four shooting guns and other war weapons are available to you for last day on earth commando survival. You as a frontline commando or IGI commando on a mission war experience the thrilling & challenging missions in shooting war ground to compete the brutal enemies.In last day commando survival takes charge as a special agent commando, an ultimate shooting commando or army real commando to take revenge and destroy all the camp of enemies. Modern commando survivor killer is the target shooting game with special hijack missions and amazing graphics so that soldier gets real feel of commando action game, with beautiful 3D mission day or night environment and also objective based basecamp environment and the first person shooting experience. Prove yourself as a patriot soldier of your country and let your nation proud of you. You are on a last day commando mission of the elite commando force and you are specially launched in the enemy’s base camp, you are the only hope left for your country defense. So be ready for the ultimate action-packed survival shooting missions and show your superhero commando skills to eliminate all the enemy’s base camps in this day to kill simulator as a superhero commando and try to survive long. Make the silent escape from the arena as you’re the last commando on earth. Recall the history of World War 2 in this commando mission adventure game 2018.Features:•	Wide weapons arsenal guns, rifles, and more•	Amazing HD graphics with beautiful 3D environment•	Realistic and smooth control•	Multiple military missions•	Thrilling weapons sound effects•	Addictive FPS shooting experience•	Best army game look like World War games

description: Our lovely girl is getting married! She has dreamed about her wedding day since she was a little girl and now the moment has finally come. Enter one of the most elegant wedding games and help the bride and bridesmaids prepare for this special event.Getting ready for a wedding is not easy, it requires some effort and fashion sense. Our wedding game for girls has 4 levels, discover all the things you can do! The bride is going to be the center of attention, you should start with her! Enter the makeup salon and try on lovely shades of lipstick, eyeshadow, eyeliner and mascara. Create a delicate makeup look for the bride to be! After that, visit the hair salon and make sure she gets the perfect hairstyle.The most important part of a bride look is the dress. Enter the wedding dress up level and choose carefully. The dressing room is filled with all types of amazing wedding gowns and you can try all of them before you decide which one looks best on the sweet girl. Whatever you like, you will find it at the wedding fashion salon. Don't forget to pick a nice flower bouquet and a bride veil.The bridesmaids will also need a fashion adviser, don't forget to play dress up with them too. You can pick matching outfits or completely different clothes for each girl. Even though the bride is the most important person at the wedding, the bridesmaids will also need to shine. Do your best as a wedding stylist!Classy Wedding Salon game features:💐 a gorgeous bride and 3 bridesmaids💐 makeup, hair and dress up game levels💐 wedding themed makeup, hairstyles and clothing items (dresses, blouses, skirts and lots of accessories)💐 girly graphics and intuitive gameplay💐 free to play wedding game💐 fun and safe for little girls💐 no wifi gameThe wedding will start soon and these lovely girls need you! Join them right away in one of the most amazing wedding games. Do the bride's makeup, style her hair and find the perfect wedding dress. Then, explore different fashion options with the 3 bridesmaids. You will never get bored of this game for girls, give it a chance and let the fun begin!

description: The new Super Panther Hero is in town, Panther Super Villain Bank Robbery game is the new Super villain fighting game of the house. It will bring you a whole new story with the amazing twists and turns. It will take you to a ride of the millennium. Test the real badness in the Super Panther Hero. Super panther hero fights with city cops with the help of evil powers and escape in front of city police in this Super Panther Hero Bank Robbery: Crime City game.Being bad is also a good thing. Enjoy the life of a bank robber in Super Panther Hero Bank Robbery. Play as a Super villain in Super Panther Hero Bank Robbery: Crime City. Being a Villain not only mean to kill and steal but you also need to run for your own life. There are also so many life turning events in the game that you will not only play the game but will also live the game.Game Play:Super Panther Hero Bank Robbery: Crime City is exciting game with thrilling gameplay where you have left your old town and came to the city with a lot of dreams which you believed will come true. As you have landed on the bus stop some thugs tried to steal from you and you accidentally killed them with your power. They were the members of the Foot Clan a well-known Gangsters and Mafia organized Ganged that have all the good and the bad in their pockets.Even the Gods have the rivals so do the man. The rivals of the foot clans have seen what you can do and need to help them to rob the bank for them. Otherwise he will be handed over to the foot clan and will be executed. You will need to rob the bank. Sneak in to the bank at night and beat all in your way. Make sure you make it out alive coz police will be standing out to catch you.Beat them all and Escape in the world Fastest Super Car. Feel the need for fast speed and escape like smoke. Panther Super Villain Bank Robbery is not only running from the police but you will also need to out run the thugs and Gangsters.Lighting hero will also be looking for you everywhere so you need to escape the city before they all catch you. You need to escape the city as soon as possible. Super Panther Hero Bank Robbery: Crime City is the Super Panther Bank Robbery game.Key Features:•	Story mode with the most Amazing Story of the year.•	Game with the animated Cut Scene.•	New Game Changing Environment (Indoor and Out Door Environment).•	Super-Fast Cars.•	Amazing Game play and smooth controls.Being bad and the most furious Super Villain also means driving super cars, robbing a bank, money and all that money can buy. You don’t need to be afraid as you have the power of a panther inside you. Lighting hero will also be looking for you everywhere so you need to escape the city before they all catch you. You need to escape the city as soon as possible. Super Panther Hero Bank Robbery: Crime City is the Super Panther Bank Robbery game.

comments: This is a very fun game. It got me hooked for hours. However, there are still some things that need improvement. For example, when walking sideways along fences you can get over them. This is an issue as once i did this and fell into the water not being able to get back on. Also, the spikes do not seem to have an effect on the shark so they are useless. I do believe that the developer needs to continue to work on this game and introduce new items and uses for them.

You cannot walk on wooden fundations and you cannot walk on single or double foundations. Please fix this it is very annoying and im not able to play the game, because when the shark attacks in a corner you cannot hit him with your spear. This is the same for the zombie. I built a little house on the raft and it spawned behind the wall of my house. Please fix it

It's honestly a pretty good game, it's fun, even though there's no real end goal and a lack of side quests. Although many improvements can be made to the game, the worst part is the ads, it's really bad, and it's insulting as a player that they try to milk this much out of us. You have constant random ads that take over your game at any moment. 5 ads per chest you craft to unlock each slot, ads when you switch to the map, floating treasure chests that require ads to open, even more pointless ads at every crafting bench, and the list goes on. I would gladly even pay to play an ad free version, but this is just ridiculous.
When will there be quests?  I'm up to level 10 and have a badass raft but there is nothing to do and I can't build the chemistry table. I have no way to get mortar and pedestal.
I never get any mission do to. Give me an update plz
Its a awesome games but the problem is the aids!! This game same like (last day on earth survival) so guys i hope u remove the poor aids okay

Bearing in mind all these qualities of build and survive games, you’d not forget about your health status in the harsh conditions. Fishing and hunting is the only way to succeed and not to starve to death in raft survival in the ocean.

comments: Come for the cats, stay for the cats. Very fun, no-pressure non-competitive collection and idle management game. Graphics are great, the gameplay is simple to grasp but has a bit of strategy to it, the devs are attentive and responsive. A true freemium: completists may want to spend money to get even more cats and support the devs but that's it. It's one of the rare games where free players don't miss out on anything or aren't slowed down. Looking forward to chat improvements so I can give it 5*.

I really like this game! Not only is it incredibly addictive (thank goodness you can play offline), but the art and story is both awesome and adorable. I chuckle all the time whenever I win, get a hero or just a little "haha" moment in the story. Sometimes I even play the minigames and watch the ads not for the double gold or energy potions. In a nutshell, if you like cats, fun, humor and zombie dogs, then this is the perfect game for you.

IT'S SO ADDICTING I love this game. Why? 1. I 💟 Cats. 2. It's a great time killer. 3. The cats are so CUTE 4. I'm obsessed. 5. All my friends think that this game is cool.  This game lags alot tough. But it's fine. It doesn't lag for a long time.⏳  It's really cool when the cats evolve. They change their outfits and if you evolve alot of times, they could have 2 powers.   The mythic is the BEST. They're powerful and cool. I like their 2nd and 3rd outfits. Kinda expensive for the cats to evolve for mythic.  Rare is also cool. They are less expensive than the mythic. But, they use the same embers. The embers they use to evolve is not easy to get.  Common... Cheap, but cool. They use different embers and it's easier to get.  I love the battles. You are doing the same thing over and over again but it is very addicting.  Overall, this game is amazing. Download it.

I absolutely love this game! The only problem is that it tends to crash every so often on my Moto phone(I use a Moto g5), but I am aware that this issue is being looked into by the devs. The story is amazing(Especially the Valentine's event story) and I find it interesting on how all the cats have all these unique phrases! Awesome game, PocApp Studios!

This is an amazing game! I love everything about it! My one problem is that the quests respond relatively slowly, but that is a very small problem because they eventually respawn. Also some quests are level based and all of them require certain a skill(s). If you are interested in this game know that there are many amazing things about this game that should make you want to install this! I know this is supposed to be a short review, but when there are so many awesome things (and I am not great with the term short in writing) about this game I can't help writing so much about it. Overall amazing and addictive game. You may be personally offended if out of the two, cats and dogs, you like dogs better. Luckily for me I love them both the same! Hope this review was helpful!

It's a great game really! But lately I've noticed that my game is a bit zoomed in, like when I go to the upgrades for cloth and stuff the gems and coins are like cut off in the middle and I wanted to dismiss some cats that I already got but the button is cut off so I can't see or click it. Wondering if that is the game or not because I've tried to see if it's my phone but nothing works to make the game screen zoom out a bit.

description: Trap Adventure  is on of the best new flash games ever. even if it looks like an arcade game, Trap Adventure is beating the records right now with a huge sucess.as like as every flash game, Trap Adventure is known by the easy and funny gameplay, 2 buttons to move and one to jump.Jump high and try to avoid spikes. Spikes will kill you. They will. Always.TrapAdventure is all about traps. And hardest adventure. You jump jump jump, try to avoid traps, but in the end you'll get spikes. Sharpest spikes. And more traps.Be vigilant! Traps are everywhere in the TrapAdventure. They hide in the shadows, but when you're not careful they'll strike! And your adventure in the world of traps will end. Are there 2 same traps in the Trap Adventure ? No, they are different, they wait for you to get near...Welcome to Trap Extreme Adventure ! The hardest platform retro game you can find right now on the market.

comments: Graphics need an improvement, nothing drastic.  Musical score is great, just like the show.   Gameplay is diverse enough to keep you engaged. I would like to see mpre options for alliances in the future. Perhaps a deceptions option list where you can try to steal from other players without fighting. Stuff like that.   Otherwise enjoyable.

This game favors the higher level players or those willing to pay. You'll get top level 5 or 6 and get attacked by someone at least twice your level and lose all your resources. It'll take days for your forces to be healed cause it takes resources to heal them, which were stolen. Anyone you attack won't have much resources for you to steal cause they've either given up on the frame or too low of a level to have anything, so it's a huge waste of time. You can get a shield, but you have to buy what you can't get for free. It's a shame cause it's an okay game.

Absolutely full of bugs, glitches, awful service and not worth the free download. Have wasted so much $$$ on packs and lost this due to glitches and faults in game. Developers refuse to even respond to tickets now, terrible customers service, especially towards paying customers. Do not recommend. Overpriced and faulty packs and faulty game mechanics.
It's nice to not have packs pop up every time you go to a new area of game! Although, once I bound my account to Facebook,  lagging and crashing started to occur.

Game crashed and I lost all progress including $$$ spent. Developers will not reply to my repeated requests to resolve the issue. Many other players have had the exact same problem. I would recommend people stay away from this game

Game is only fun if you have deep pockets.  Dev are only intetested in making money.  Can reach lvl 10 but lack of sufficient resources in game or on map and constantly being zeroed by high level make the game undesirable.   Great concept poorly executed
description: Westeros is at war. Great houses clash, dragons rule the sky, and the army of the dead threatens the realm.  Live out your fantasy and join the war.  Build your house and raise your army as you navigate a dangerous political landscape.  Based on the award winning HBO series, Game of Thrones: Conquest allows players to become a Lord in Westeros and define a strategy for conquering the Seven Kingdoms. Winter is here and your enemy’s army will not wait to clash swords.  Wage war and join the battle today to capture the Iron Throne!A TRUE GAME OF THRONES EXPERIENCE“In the game of thrones, you win or you die.” - Cersei Lannister-Become a lord of Westeros: Build your great house, create your sigil, and Fight for the Crown-Interact with key characters from the hit HBO series including Jon Snow, Daenerys Targaryen, Petyr Baelish, Cersei Lannister and more.-Capture 120+ iconic Seats of Power like Winterfell, Castle Black, Dragonstone, and King’s Landing-Navigate the dangerous political landscape using the innovative Allegiance System to live out the fantasy of claiming The Iron Throne and -winning the Great WarTHE SEVEN KINGDOMS WILL REMEMBER YOUR NAME“It’s the family name that lives on. It’s all that lives on.” - Tywin Lannister-Build your house and claim your territory to rise in political influence-Raise your army and clash against rival lords to capture iconic Seats of Power-Defend your strongholds, as each Seat of Power endows you with military and economic upgrades-Dominate the map, clash with your enemies, and spread your influenceMAKE KINGS RISE AND FALL“Fight every battle everywhere, always, in your mind. Everyone is your enemy, everyone is your friend.” - Petyr Baelish-Master the innovative social system that allows players to recruit bannermen, fight wars alongside your allies, and live out your fantasy of ruling The Seven Kingdoms-Claim the Iron Throne - In a dynamic political world, choose between deception and loyalty as you shift your allegiances-Reward those loyal to you with titles like Hand of the King and Master of Coin as you build your Small Council-Bestow Seats of Power to your allies granting them special military and economic advantages Only in Game of Thrones: Conquest can you become a lord of Westeros and navigate the dangerous political system as you Fight for the Crown. Interact with key characters and capture  iconic locations from the award winning HBO TV series. Dominate your enemies by using an innovative Allegiance System that allows you to recruit your friends as bannermen as you rise to take The Iron Throne. LIVE THE FANTASY - PLAY NOW AND FIGHT FOR THE CROWN!Join the conversation:https://www.facebook.com/GoTConquest/https://twitter.com/gotconquesthttps://go.wbgames.com/GoTforums

-Bestow Seats of Power to your allies granting them special military and economic advantages


Only in Game of Thrones: Conquest can you become a lord of Westeros and navigate the dangerous political system as you Fight for the Crown. Interact with key characters and capture  iconic locations from the award winning HBO TV series. Dominate your enemies by using an innovative Allegiance System that allows you to recruit your friends as bannermen as you rise to take The Iron Throne.

comments: If you are into interactive games, this is a must play. It doesn't have any romance or even a big friendship to speak of, but it is still a game worth playing. The story is interesting and above all, it is fun. The only minor drawback might be its shortness. Despite that, I can only recommend it :).

It was fun the first time. But not a lot changes between playthroughs and despite killing off ylen they appear at the end of the game like nothing happened. Good but perhaps not worth the 3-4 dollar price tag with how short it turned out to be without the replayability.

[Spoilers] Although this game is a bit short, it does deliver on its promise of an interesting storyline. There a few issues, however. As mentioned, the story is short, and because of this, your fellow Gods don't have much development aside from a few possible quests. There are also some oversights. Killing Ylen at the climax of the battle will still result in her appearing later. Things like that. If this game was expanded to a larger experience, I would happily pay more for that. As it is, it's an entertaining short CYOA.

Well i think its a bit short. Tried all possible routes. Being 100% good and 100% bad but all routes have the same ending. Not worth my money,but hey i already bought it since the first 3 chapters are good. But it was a let down

This was the best game I have ever played, no joke! I feel like it was a little too short though, what if you were to add a free mode? A mode where the story wasn't a thing, but you could play the game without it.

While overall the story was alright, it left a lot to be desired. With the game being so short, I assumed that each path had it's own story for you to explore, however the game is very strict about what you can do.  I honestly do regret purchasing the full game, as imo it falls flat fairly quickly after the first three chapters.  Overall, the idea is great, but in execution it is fairly lackluster.
description: Create a mortal race to worship you and grow your strength. Guide them in their daily lives and help them grow. The power you collect will grow your mind and body. Dabble in the affairs of other gods or seek to destroy them and steal their power."The Aether: Life as a God" is a 60,000 word interactive fantasy novel by A. Reddwolf, where your choices control the story. It's entirely text-based—without graphics or sound effects—and fueled by the vast, unstoppable power of your imagination.• Create a custom mortal race.• Engage in mortal affairs.• Travel the Aether and steal power from lesser beings.• Dabble in political affairs at The Court of Gods.• Battle other gods in epic one one one conflicts.• Complete unique quests and events with impactful outcomes.
descriptionHTML:
Create a mortal race to worship you and grow your strength. Guide them in their daily lives and help them grow. The power you collect will grow your mind and body. Dabble in the affairs of other gods or seek to destroy them and steal their power.

"The Aether: Life as a God" is a 60,000 word interactive fantasy novel by A. Reddwolf, where your choices control the story. It's entirely text-based—without graphics or sound effects—and fueled by the vast, unstoppable power of your imagination.

• Create a custom mortal race.
• Engage in mortal affairs.
• Travel the Aether and steal power from lesser beings.
• Dabble in political affairs at The Court of Gods.
• Battle other gods in epic one one one conflicts.
• Complete unique quests and events with impactful outcomes.
recentChanges: • Countless minor bug fixes and changes.
• Tweaked the rate at which you gain alignment points toward Good/Evil.
• You should now receive the correct ending to Nothastrus' quest.
• Ylen should now reward you with the correct amount of power.
• In one of the later chapters, your race should no longer temporarily go from millions to a few hundred population.
summary: Rule over your mortal race, explore the Aether, and become an omnipotent god.
title: The Aether: Life as a God

comments: I would've rated it 5 stars if it was somehow faster. I just want to fastforward all the animation that is happening there. I mean I saw it the first time. Great. I got it: "cat jumps into a boat and then goes underwater, after that it goes out". All this animation takes more time than the actual playing. Same thing with letters: I get letters every time. And I've stoped reading them cause there is a lot of text and I have no idea what for. Inspite of that - it's a good game. Nice and simple

I think this is a really cute game so far. Nice time waster. Couple of problems with reading letters, sometimes it will say "new" and nothing is there, or I try to read the letter and it ends and I can't scroll. Another plus would be to add how many fish are needed to get gold in the fish trophy category. Overall, still a really cute game. Worth the install no doubt!

Ads aren't a problem in this game. As for the game itself, my girlfriend and I love it. It's a good time waster and it can get pretty addicting. Some reviews expressed annoyance at the price of upgrades, but we have almost fully upgraded our gun and tank and it's been fine. We get about 40,000 each catch so far, so exchanging for parts is no big deal. Maybe people just haven't figured out how to be more efficient.

This game is just perfect. It has a complete free to play style and doesn't force ads upon you, instead, they are completely optional to get extra currency or more time. You could go through the entire game without watching a single dad if you wanted to and I love these types of games. The graphics are adorable and the controls are easy. I highly recommend this game.

Fun and relaxed game that I can easily see myself spending hours sniping fish. There is a bit of strategy to the game with the changing weather, predators, and upgrade system. Blindly shooting your harpoon will just lead to short, frustrating sessions so its best to learn the mechanics quickly or you'll end up with pretty sad catches. Thankfully, its a straightforward game so most should have no problem with it. With all the features, its well worth an install/play. Bonus? The ads are entirely optional and provide YOU bonuses.

It's hard to come across good mobile games on the playstorw, they're usually either a rip off of another game, or a half-baked pay to win game, this game is an exception however. It's completely free to play, I'm honestly not even sure if there is in app purchases, other games would make that clear and shove it down your throat. Also if you can get me to willingly watch an ad for a game, then you get 5 stars.

descriptionHTML:
Just Freeskiing is a highly authentic ski/freeski simulation with sheer endless possibilities to tweak, style and combine realistic tricks!
The numerous Slopestyle, Halfpipe, Big-Air, Jibbing (Rails, Boxes) and Backcountry challenge locations are covering a huge variety of freeskiing.

The game features a powerful yet simple steering technology with supportive in-game tutorials and simple buttons for beginners and advanced possibilities (2x taps, swipes, etc.) as well as enhancements (Grab-Trick-Packages) for Pro’s.

Summarized, the aim of the game is to beat the world’s best scores and to master given challenges in order to improve your overall skiing skills.

Let’s go and give it a try !!


FEATURES
- Finest freeskiing action sports simulation
- Halfpipe, Slopestyle, Park, Slopes and Backcountry
- „Real Resort“ Level: LAAX, Switzerland
- 5 unique levels with a total of 38 spots
- 4 Customizable male & female characters
- Several skis to choose from
- Challenge, Competition and Training mode
- Beat the World’s Best Scores
- Tilt- or virtual joystick navigation
- Replay option
- English and German language


TRICK POSSIBILITIES
Slope: Ollie, Revert, Powerslide, Powerturn
Slides: 50-50, Slide, Nosepress, Tailpress, Noseslide, Tailslide
Tricks/Grabs: Safety L/R, Nosegrab L/R, Tailgrab L/R, Double-Hand Nosegrab, Double-Hand-Tailgrab, Mute L/R,Octo L/R, Japan L/R, LS Shifty, RS Shifty
Rotations: LS Spins, RS Spins, SW LS Spins, SW RS Spins, Frontflips, Backflips, Rodeos, Misty Flips, Corked Spins


OPTIMIZED
The game graphics are optimized for newer and powerful device. Graphics quality and performance may vary depending on your device.


IN APP PURCHASES
The game offers an In-App purchase for each level to get permanent and unlimited access. To get access to all Trick-Buttons and more Grab-Tricks, there is a Grab-Package In-App purchase within the game.


MORE ACTION SPORTS GAMES
For more Freestyle Ski games, Freeski games and Snowboard games, please visit our website rndrln-games.com


IMPORTANT NOTICE
If you experience any problems with the game or in case you have any questions or comments, please contact us directly - support(at)randerline.com.

description: Welcome to the best taxi service in the Big Apple! Revel in the magic of New York City! Pick up passengers from the busy streets of New York City and drop them off at their desired destinations on time. NYC Fastlane Taxi Driver is packed with thrilling missions in the crowded streets of the city that never sleeps! It’s a dream come true!  Experience first hand different exciting, urban neighborhoods. Drive by famous fast food and shopping advertisements; make a trip around Times Square; embrace famous skyscrapers like the Empire State Building; and race through rush hour to get a surge in wages! With realistic simulation, and mesmerizing 3D graphics, don’t miss out on this trip!  Maneuver your taxi around traffic and other diverse vehicles like trucks, luxury cars, buses, and motorcycles. Watch out for those pesky bicycles that the city is notorious for! Beat your competition: trains and public transportation. With good service, you’ll have customers swarming to you! But be careful… measure your time and limits wisely. Be punctual, safe, and efficient! The people of NYC are depending on you! Don’t be late! descriptionHTML:

description: Because of the holidays, this high school girl got fat and she urgently needs to suit her special outfit for the school opening. You are assigned to be her personal trainer that will help her to gain the desired weight and aspect in a very short time. In this dress up game, you will be a fashion designer as much as a gym trainer. Put her to work and make sure she accomplish all the exercises you've recommended to her in order to lose weight as soon as possible. Follow the given instructions and try to do all the types of movements in the right order and using the proper procedure for each device aside. Once in a  while, you will offer a pause to hydrate and to erase the sweat. Go through the whole circuit and get all the things done. When all the needed calories are burned you can move to feeding part which is an important step in an equilibrate life. You will have to cook the food that will be good for her condition but still has the proteins that her body requires. You will prepare a delicious chicken soup with vegetables that will be her meal after the training. Now that you have seen how the exercise and the cooking part should be done you can go to the dressing room. Choose a proper makeup, put on a dress that will help this girl stand out her silhouette now that she work so hard to have it. Add a pair of matching shoes, maybe some shiny accessories and don't forget to arrange the final touches.There are many appealing features this game provides and you are able to check them in this rubric:- Experience a wonderful gameplay- Free to play- Pretty accessories and great clothing- Transform a messy girl into a beautiful teenager- Be a fashion designer and a trainer too- Cute clothing with unique details on- Have fun playing interactive activities with a nice girl- Discovering new types of exercises and why not, try them yourself- Learning the importance of a good and healthy lifestyle- Help a girl to regain her wished weight

description: Disney Mech-X4 Robot AR Battle**Requires Purchase of the Mech-X4 Technopathy Robot and Mech-Link Band (sold together) to play**It's time to prepare for battle and "Mech-execute"! Based on the Disney Channel and Disney XD show Mech-X4, download the Mech-X4 Robot AR Battle app to your smart phone or tablet to utilize augmented reality along with your Mech-X4 Technopathy Robot and Mech-Link Band set to battle virtual monsters from the show! The Mech-Link band allows you to control 5 unique battle actions on the Technopathy Robot recreating Ryan’s ability to control machines with his mind. Using the app, battle the four key monsters from the show via LED light recognition from Mech-X4’s multi-color light up Visor and "X" to signify different battle modes.The Disney Mech-X4 Robot AR Battle app allows you to:>        Battle virtual monsters using 5 unique actions: "Mech-execute"  to power up, Right punch, Left jab, Activate defense shields and Repair mode>        Fight four ferocious monsters from the show: Jaguasaur, Clawboon, Chameleo-Wasp and Harper Beast.>        Level up and learn new battle techniques to defeat the monsters in a whole new way!>      Earn Monster Hearts to upgrade the 4 battle modes: Agility, Weapons, Defense Shields, Repair>       Defeat all the monsters to save Bay City from total destruction!
descriptionHTML:

comments: Awesome game. Very nice controls but greedy devs. I spend money in games but to pay 59 sek just to remove ads is too much. And too many ads which spoils the otherwise great game. Either reduce the cost to remove ads or include other benefits to the same cost. The frequency of ads should be reduced.

Fun gameplay, but a bit buggy and confusing when a train is near a switch since you often stop a train when trying to switch it. Difficulty ramps up to insanely unfair after the first few levels. Since the passengers spawn at random even when you're absolutely perfect at switching the trains you still don't often get 3 stars on the level. Getting 3 stars on a level is basically luck at that point.

This game was great for the first few levels, and then some frustrations set in about the design. Some levels are just tough to see which tracks go where because of the nature of the isometric view, but the real deal breaker for me is having to click the arrow to switch a track path. Why can't this be a lever to the side of the track, especially when two path switches overlap? Countless times I've accidentally stopped a train on an intersection instead of switching the track for the next train. It tests your patience instead of your multitasking and tracking abilities. The ads are very, very plentiful. I urge you to continue using the free version if you want to support the devs because they probably get more revenue from ads in the long run than the $5 cost to remove the ads. Potentially great.

Rigged gameplay. I made it thru several levels until I tapped on the train and it didnt stop, resulting in a crash, further resulting in a 30 second ad that I couldn't escape. How convenient. I have noticed more and more developers finding ever-newer ways to slip ads into the games.
Hadn't played it for a while, went back and it had deleted all my progress. Not going to start again, so deleting the app

This game was honestly amazing. I love how it's such a simple game yet it's so much fun to play. The low poly graphics and the music really synchronized and make it so much more better. Even the tutorial, it integrates into the game in a very interesting manner. The only problem was that it lags a bit, but otherwise Northplay, loved it!

As you progress you unlock new trains, gain access to new beautiful and mysterious regions and earn awards.  • Conduct trains in beautiful low-poly 3D worlds • Simple and intuitive gameplay for everyone, just tap to start/stop trains and control switches • Transport passengers, earn coins and unlock new themed regions • Unlock trains found in the real world, such as the French TGV and Japanese Shinkansen, to expand your train collection • Seriously challenging puzzles in clever levels that will push you to the limit • Earn awards for completing regions and marvel at your success in the company HQ • Share your most explosive crashes with your friends • Fantastic soundtrack by composer Simon Kölle

descriptionHTML:
A brain-training puzzle in which you draw 1 line, that will sharpen your wits.
In this free-to-play puzzle game, you merely have to draw one line. It is deceptively simple, yet profoundly deep.
Play through the extensive stages, sharpening your wits as you have fun.

Summary
A brain-training puzzle game that activates your mind as you play.
When you've got a spare moment, on your daily commute, or before going to bed, why not experience what it feels like to activate you mind?

How to play
There is only one rule:
"Connect all the points with just one line."
It doesn't matter where you start.

There are some fiendishly tricky, complicated puzzles among the large number of stages.
When you get stuck, make use of a hint.

Stages
There are 10 levels, and a total of 500 stages.
At first, it starts off with simple shapes, but each time your level increases, the number of lines increases, and it gets more and more complicated.
You might think it's too easy early on.
However, clearing the simple stages is also important.
The hints to clearing the later, more complicated stages can all be found scattered through the simple stages.

Some unique types of line, such as "one way lines" and "overlapping lines", can also be found throughout the stages.
These special lines will encourage your imagination.

Use this chance to activate your mind as you play, by trying to solve this free-to-play brain-training puzzle game.
You're sure to get hooked!!

comments: The stories are addicting and exciting. But you make us watch several ads and THEN ask us to pay for EVERY THING extra. From clothes to hair to what to say next to new chapters. I get the world revolves around money but you are getting paid plenty with these big name ads. Let the game be more enjoyable and make it free or a set price from the start for the app. You lure people in and then ask for money if they want to continue. Nah, I'll wait an hour for the ticket. Great game concept though.

It's like Episode's ugly cousin. Story line is okay, character look is very limited, in order to play the rest of the game you HAVE to pay a subscription fee like the game is worth it. For one month it's 7.99 and may I remind you that Netflix (10000% better) is the exact same price as that for a standard pack. Episode (story app like this) is much more cost-efficient and over all better because at the very least you can make your character resemble you, don't have to spend so much out of your pocket, and Episode also isn't prone to crashing like this one.

I've only read 1 story so far. The story itself wasn't bad. The characters are kind of goofy looking but I like the app. You're able to earn gems as you go. It does give you only 1 ticket at a time, per hr. But it also gives you the option to watch videos to speed up the clock so you can get it sooner. Which NONE of the other apps like this do! However, at the moment, it isn't working for me. No matter how many times I try to speed up the clock, it isn't budging. It was working 2 hrs ago. So, IDK if there is a daily limit or what, because I didn't get a warning. There is something about the videos I don't like though... After you watch them, it automatically brings you to the app store to download whatever game you just watched the video for. Sooooo annoying! Otherwise, not a bad game thus far. It is a great time waster!

well, first the characters are goofy- looking and the the choices to customize your character are limited. Most of the stories are intriguing and actually enjoyable, however I would personally stop playing this game after a couple of days, because it is difficult to earn passes and the game doesn't hook you enough to return to the game like other choice games such as episode. Episode,on the other hand is extremely addicting which is what makes it so popular. It's not terrible, but please accept my request to change the characters appearance because you have been receiving complaints about this and it would definitely attract more people to your game.  Thanks

I pay for the unlimited ticket and never got what I paid for. Customer service has been unhelpful. I have emailed them many times and have gotten nothing but surveys back. My issue has not been taken care of.

I REALLY LOVE THIS GAME!!  This game is amazing and a great time killer! I've used the game in the past when they gave 2 tickets but I've recently downloaded it, they only give 1 ticket for 1 HOUR! The stories it self is good, the characters lacks some things, the stories are too short. The 'free' diamonds doesn't work, when ever I click on it, it goes black and closes the app which is frustrating. The choices in the stories are 10 to 25 GEMS which takes forever for someone like me who doesn't pay for gems. BUT other then that there isn't anything I could think of from the top of my head.  So, please fix these....

Unfortunate that its turned into a pay to play where I have to buy coins to unlock new levels. Might quit because of that but fun for the first few days)
Stop telling what a need to do when solving the puzzle.
It's like minesweeper mix with picross!

Great mix of many logic games.  Very unique game and very challanging.  Unlimited hints, but the hints show WHY, allowing you to learn and become better, allowing tou to challange yourself at your pace.  Ad's are completely optional.  You get a bonus to watch them, but the bonus does not change the playability of the game.  5 stars.  I wish there were 6 to give.

comments: The app is excellent. It is everything I want in a mobile NASCAR game. The only problems I have are in the visual look, as cars have only one paint scheme option, and the pit stalls and track textures are somehow outdated? (Sprint cup logo is visible, Chase Elliot is #24, etc.) I can't wait to see where they go woth this game in the future.

If you add a way to brake or just slow down, then it will be perfect. But when a wreck happens, you have to get in a certain lane to avoid it, but getting in that lane causes you to plow through multiple cars in front of you and so you wreck anyway.  If you could sit behind a car going the same speed, it would be very helpful.

Emphasizes timing, but doesn't have depth. Unlockable paint schemes and (not very many) tracks. Advertisements very much forced into the way of gameplay.  Monster Energy girls pop on to your screen with a dirty look constantly...

Impossible to not not crash when they are 3 wide and going the same speed in front of you and only 3 lanes to race in, No choice but to crash plus the lag doesn't help make it any easier to play! 2 stars is being nice this game needs a massive improvement
Even if I pass the car, I just get hit from the back of it. Sure it's graphics are good, but the control and turning of the car is impossible to master.
Not a real racing game. It's basically Subway Surfers using cars. Graphics are nice looking though. Would have been awesome if this was a real Nascar racing game.

descriptionHTML:

INTUITIVE CONTROLS
• Switch lanes with a single tap or swipe

• Draft to save fuel so you can reach the pits
• Repair Damage, Refuel, or Change Tires – what you do in the pits could make or break your race!

REAL WORLD DRIVERS AND TRACKS
• Select from any of the best NASCAR drivers
• Race across all 23 Monster Energy NASCAR Cup Series Tracks

INCREASE YOUR PERFORMANCE
• Collect cards for your album to boost your performance
• Use card fragments to enhance your car’s abilities
• Complete your card collection to dominate the competition

3 WAYS TO RACE
• Missions – Complete missions to earn cash and gold, unlock cards, and increase your fame
• Endless Race – Earn rewards based on how far you can drive
• Live Event – Compete with other racers in weekly events that follow along with the actual Monster Energy NASCAR Cup season

LEADERBOARDS
• See who can drive the furthest and how you rank against your friends

---

description: The City police force has set up a new HQ in the mountains. Test out their new vehicles and catch crooks with the Net Shooter!BE A CREATIVE LEGO® CITY HERO!LEGO® City is a creative mission-based game for brave 6-8-year-old everyday heroes. Build cool vehicles to put out fires, construct buildings, save minifigures in distress at sea, chase crooks across the City, explore the mysteries of the jungle or the dangerous volcanic excavation site!DEVELOP SKILLS THROUGH PLAYYoung LEGO City heroes can experiment with the basics of physics and practice their fine motor skills while dodging obstacles, reaching goals, and saving the day in a thrilling race against the clock!FEATURES • BUILD ICONIC VEHICLES: Players can build their own versions of LEGO City vehicles including fire trucks, police cars, construction vehicles, helicopters, coastguard boats, jungle ATVs, and many more.• BUILD A WHOLE CITY: Watch the City grow with every completed heroic mission.• ENGAGING ENVIRONMENTS: Every area in LEGO City needs a hero: The city centre, the jungle, the volcano, even the sky and the sea! • RACE AGAINST TIME: A real hero can keep cool under pressure – each mission must be completed before the clock runs out!• ENDLESS BUILDING COMBINATIONS: Combine vehicle parts to create your own super-vehicles!• AGE-APPROPRIATE: Intuitive navigation and lots of LEGO City humour!• SAFETY FIRST: Your child will play in a safe, closed environment, with NO third-party advertising, links to external websites, in-app purchases or hidden data collection. LEGO marketing content and information is served, for instance LEGO news about LEGO sets and other LEGO games, in hope of inspiring children’s creative play.WHY PLAY WITH LEGO CITY?Nothing beats real-life heroes! LEGO City honours the creative problem-solvers who see opportunities in life when others see obstacles, who dare break things down to rebuild them into something even better, who can keep their cool in the face of danger, and who take the time to eat a hot dog and drink hot chocolate once in a while, too. Because that’s when all the best ideas happen!For app support contact LEGO Consumer Service. For contact details refer to http://service.lego.com/contactus Our privacy policy and terms of use for apps are accepted if you download this app. Read more on http://aboutus.lego.com/legal-notice/Privacy-Policy and http://aboutus.lego.com/legal-notice/terms-of-use-for-apps LEGO and the LEGO logo are trademarks of the LEGO Group. ©2018 The LEGO Group.
descriptionHTML:
The City police force has set up a new HQ in the mountains. Test out their new vehicles and catch crooks with the Net Shooter!

BE A CREATIVE LEGO® CITY HERO!
LEGO® City is a creative mission-based game for brave 6-8-year-old everyday heroes. Build cool vehicles to put out fires, construct buildings, save minifigures in distress at sea, chase crooks across the City, explore the mysteries of the jungle or the dangerous volcanic excavation site!

DEVELOP SKILLS THROUGH PLAY
Young LEGO City heroes can experiment with the basics of physics and practice their fine motor skills while dodging obstacles, reaching goals, and saving the day in a thrilling race against the clock!

FEATURES
• BUILD ICONIC VEHICLES: Players can build their own versions of LEGO City vehicles including fire trucks, police cars, construction vehicles, helicopters, coastguard boats, jungle ATVs, and many more.
• BUILD A WHOLE CITY: Watch the City grow with every completed heroic mission.
• ENGAGING ENVIRONMENTS: Every area in LEGO City needs a hero: The city centre, the jungle, the volcano, even the sky and the sea!
• RACE AGAINST TIME: A real hero can keep cool under pressure – each mission must be completed before the clock runs out!
• ENDLESS BUILDING COMBINATIONS: Combine vehicle parts to create your own super-vehicles!
• AGE-APPROPRIATE: Intuitive navigation and lots of LEGO City humour!
• SAFETY FIRST: Your child will play in a safe, closed environment, with NO third-party advertising, links to external websites, in-app purchases or hidden data collection. LEGO marketing content and information is served, for instance LEGO news about LEGO sets and other LEGO games, in hope of inspiring children’s creative play.

WHY PLAY WITH LEGO CITY?
Nothing beats real-life heroes! LEGO City honours the creative problem-solvers who see opportunities in life when others see obstacles, who dare break things down to rebuild them into something even better, who can keep their cool in the face of danger, and who take the time to eat a hot dog and drink hot chocolate once in a while, too. Because that’s when all the best ideas happen!


For app support contact LEGO Consumer Service.
For contact details refer to http://service.lego.com/contactus

Our privacy policy and terms of use for apps are accepted if you download this app.
Read more on http://aboutus.lego.com/legal-notice/Privacy-Policy and http://aboutus.lego.com/legal-notice/terms-of-use-for-apps

LEGO and the LEGO logo are trademarks of the LEGO Group. ©2018 The LEGO Group.

description: Color by number is fun for adults as well as kids, but have you ever imagine turning number coloring book into 3D and color by numbers in a brand new angle? Now Voxel offers you the whole 3D number coloring experience, much more vivid and interesting than traditional number coloring book! Download now, paint by number and release your inner artist and re pixel mania! **Simple and QuickColor by numbers as known as pixel coloring or sand box coloring is the new trend, but what makes Voxel unique is that you can paint by number in 3D. Choose from a variety of beautiful 3D templates, follow the numbers and color box, and bring these color block to life! Try to rotate the screen and enjoy the beautiful 3D pixel art. **Stress Relief and addictiveMany grown-ups do pixel coloring to anti stress, since number coloring book is like a pixel art therapy. But do you know coloring apps in 3D will give you much more sense of achievements? You will get addictive to paint by numbers in 3D, especially with all the graphics which we work really hard on them. Take your time, relax, and enjoy coloring!**EducationalColor by number coloring book is a great way to teach your kids or students basic number recognition, and it is also important that even youngest can color by number in 3D, so that they become more aware of what a real world means. Having real objects colored, also can get the children to have better understand what they are studying. What’s more? 3D number coloring apps can actually help practice art drawing skills.Love sharing? Generate cool time-lapse video and share it to all your friends, family members and LOVED ONES! Hope we can make color by number in 3D be your favorite hobby and addicted to it again!Voxel Team
descriptionHTML:

Color by numbers as known as pixel coloring or sand box coloring is the new trend, but what makes Voxel unique is that you can paint by number in 3D. Choose from a variety of beautiful 3D templates, follow the numbers and color box, and bring these color block to life! Try to rotate the screen and enjoy the beautiful 3D pixel art.

**Stress Relief and addictive
Many grown-ups do pixel coloring to anti stress, since number coloring book is like a pixel art therapy. But do you know coloring apps in 3D will give you much more sense of achievements? You will get addictive to paint by numbers in 3D, especially with all the graphics which we work really hard on them. Take your time, relax, and enjoy coloring!

**Educational
Color by number coloring book is a great way to teach your kids or students basic number recognition, and it is also important that even youngest can color by number in 3D, so that they become more aware of what a real world means. Having real objects colored, also can get the children to have better understand what they are studying. What’s more? 3D number coloring apps can actually help practice art drawing skills.

Love sharing? Generate cool time-lapse video and share it to all your friends, family members and LOVED ONES! Hope we can make color by number in 3D be your favorite hobby and addicted to it again!

Voxel Team
